name: Samuel Walsh
text:
A technician came for routine service on Tuesday, the AC stopped working on Wednesday. On Thursday night we called to request service and a technician arrived Friday morning. I’m happy with the response time. The technician told us the breaker tripped and then charged us 139$ for his time and diagnosis.

We had this issue last summer and we were assured by the service technician that there is nothing wrong with the AC or it’s amperage, so we installed a brand new breaker. Today I was told by customer service that the issue again must be with the breaker and not the AC, so we are stuck with the charge. I’m really starting to wonder what the point of paying for a service contract is.

Customer service is friendly and the “hold” music is soothing.

text: Been a customer for over 10 years. A/C unit stopped working and they sent technician who gave wrong diagnosis of problem, confirmed by 2nd diagnosis from another company. Charged $189 for wrong diagnosis. Refused to give refund. Left three messages for owner to call me to discuss. Still waiting for return call. BUYER BEWARE. Check Better Business Bureau site to read real issues with this company and decide if you want to do business with Climatemp.  They have lost my trust and my business!

name: Lynne Hall
text: Climatemp installed a high end Carrier system 4 years ago.  Now, July, having condensation dripping from indoor unit and damaging ceiling on lower level of house. Home warranty sent a an HVAC professional to house.  He stated unit was improperly installed by Climatemp and duct work had separated from unit creating condensation which is dripping to floor below.  Also possibly causing the unit to underperform.  He is unable to repair the duct work due to how the unit was installed.  Climatemp worked on the unit in December and stated there was no issue then, (it’s not hot in December).  They will not stand behind their installation work. Spoke with Carrier, they allow any licensed HVAC company which is licensed to install their product.

name: mark fuller
text: Was told service call was 89$ after a 10 minute diagnosis was given a bill for 139$ turns out 89$ is just to show up, if they get out of the truck there’s a labor charge also. Technician told me what I needed and said would take a half hour to put in and part would be under warranty. Called me 2 days later to tell me the 30 minute repair was going to cost 250$ that’s a 389$ total for a warranty repair and under an hour labor. If money is no object this your shop. The original owner warranty is ten years and subsequent owner warranty is five years. Installation date 9/29 /17 as per your estimate. And don’t act like you installed or fixed anything because you certainly didn’t. And for you as the owner to respond with this tale is is further proof of the right decision I made to go elsewhere.

name: Rena Allen
text: The guys were very professional and did a great job putting in our ac system works amazing well done and then one month we found mold in the ac vents  and called climatemp out to do a mold treatment and also to clean vents they recommended a air scrubber which I wasn’t familiar with thought it was a good  thing to have they were saying positive things  Said it would eliminate mold and help with cleaner air. I asked them to clean inside the ac vents where the mold was but they didn’t get cleaned  the guys said they another job to go do. I was told the air scrubber we bought was to eliminate the mold that was still in the vents and prevent new mold from growing completely. I stayed away 24 hours cause I’m  sensitive to chemicals and especially mold I’ve dealt with mold before and became very ill and stayed in hospital. The night I did return home I woke up at 2 am with tightness in my chest and throat irritation and was very uncomfortable had fire dept to check me out was upset about it. I googled more about the air scrubber and found some people don’t do well with it and I feel I’m one of them and the side effects were what I was experiencing. It’s been two days and I will not stay at home. I called one of the owners David and asked them to please remove the air scrubber system it was the weekend so they were gonna charge me service call which wasn’t a big deal but I wasn’t even told when they did mold treatment what kind of treatment or was there mold in the ducts I feel like I’m scared to be in my own home. I don’t want to upset anyone But I would have liked to known. I talked to one of the owners David he was trying to make me feel better about the situation but I’m thinking the air scrubber is not for us.  which was very nice but I feel like im not going to do well with a system that isn’t helping me and I want to be comfortable in my home. I hope this company will make this right for us. They are very professional and have helped us in the past. I didn’t know how I would react to the air scrubber and I’m not doing well I would like to fix it please thanks so much.

resp.text: This is fantastic thank you so much for choosing Climatemp Cooling & Heating inc. as your Heating and air conditioning provider.

name: J
text:
Climatemp sold and installed two new Carrier Infinity series, 18 seer units  in 2019.  These came with a 10 year parts/labor warranty.  In 13 months, Unit A stopped cooling 3 times over several months and Climatemp was unable to effect permanent repairs.  The last time Climatemp repaired unit A, it stopped working within 18 hours.  This was after several days of disruption, no AC, and probably 10 hours of attempts to fix it.  Unit B stopped cooling at the 7-month mark and the air handler had to be replaced.  They broke the condensate pump which leaked water everywhere and didn't seal the discharge side into the main duct during the install.  In addition, I have seen several misdiagnosed issues,  unterminated wires, holes in return box, and uninsulated freon lines to name just a few issues.  My favorite was the condensate pump installed so that it blocked the door from closing to the air handler room.  The customer service is awful.  Nobody will call you back.  You have to follow up on everything yourself.  I had a no show on more than one occasion and when I called to ask where the tech was, “oh he’s not going to be able to make it.”  After unit A stopped cooling, yet again, and nearly immediately after the last attempt to fix it, I attempted to reach a final resolution with the GM David, but he never called me back.  He told me he would speak to the owner and let me know what they decided, but no call.  It would be laughable if I hadn’t spent 14k on two units and was one year into a 10 year parts/labor warranty.  In the end, I never heard from him again, all while unit A was not cooling.  Ultimately, I had to get Carrier involved who thankfully switched my parts and labor warranty to another local factory authorized dealer, who has been amazing.  The new dealer fixed unit A on the first attempt, in about two hours, which was over pressurized with freon, and had been incorrectly diagnosed by Climatemp.  They provided updates through the whole process.  Then, they reconfigured unit A and B, which were never set up properly and were running inefficiently on factory default settings.  I would give anything to be able to go back and avoid ever using Climatemp, but they had such good reviews.  I discovered that A LOT of them are from their own employees.  Even the techs told me, they’re told to leave five-star reviews on google and have their friends and family do the same.  Look through the reviews and you will see the same names that you hear when you call dispatch or receive an email.  The owners, and the GM leave them, as well as their family.  You will see the same names leaving reviews across every location.  Normal customers don’t do that.  When bad reviews are left, you will see threats of litigation and claims of fake reviews.  Folks this company is shameful.  Please save yourself and use any number of available HVAC companies in Baldwin county.  If you have a part/labor warranty with them and you feel trapped, call Carrier.  They can and will help you.

** In response to the owner's claim - the last time your technician was in my home, he was there for nearly six hours.  I loaned him my extension cords and fed him dinner.  Your claim of being limited to 30 minutes is as disingenuous as the rest of your business practices.

resp.text: J please give us a call we would love to help you out sounds like you are one of a handful out of over 300 reviews that had an issue which we are human and do make mistakes as the loyal company we will strive to do our best to make things right in this relationship it takes two that’s loyal HONEST customers as well! If your not given the Proper opportunity to fix things then the problem becomes worse. Now the times we came to your house we had a time limit of less than 30min by you to fix your unit I don’t think that was the right approach! Please give us call at 251-968-6006 and give us the time we need while we are their to do our Job. Thanks,have a blessed day.

name: Jessica Cajueiro
text: If I could leave zero stars here I would! My unit, which I’ll admit is old, but it still works… Was not cooling as well as usual. This has happened previously and it needed Freon. So I called  Climatemp to come out… I knew they like to try to upsell your unit but I had them come out anyway. I had called and they told me there was an $89 service/diagnostic fee. So long story short… The guy came out opened the unit and within 10 minutes told my husband we needed a brand new unit that it would cost @ $3000 just to fix the leak. I told him no thank you we would get another opinion that I was not spending $10,000 today on a new unit. He then asked me “ What’s the right price to get you to say yes to a new unit today?” Climatemp keeps your credit card on file and within 45 minutes charged my account $189… For nothing! Within that same amount of time I had had another local company come out they had already fixed my unit, my house was cool and only charged me $150. Climatetemp does not tell you that they charge you $25 per 15 minutes they are there… If you do the math that is $1.66 PER MINUTE!! We would definitely not have let the technician take his 10 minute cigarette  break in our front yard if we had known we were paying that per minute!! They were there for 15 minutes, just wanted to sell us a new $8000 unit and told us ours could not be fixed for less than $3000, did not give us accurate information on charges, never left us an invoice and still won’t give us one, just charged my card. Terrible way to do business!!

resp.text: Jessica, we are sorry you feel that way after further investigation yes your unit was very old and had multiple R22 Freon leaks in it. The laws require us to fix and repair the leak before we put r-22 Freon back in this is a costly repair especially in your case where a whole coil was going to have to be replaced to fix your unit. So yes a coil plus recharging your unit with r-22 is a very costly repair. You say you paid 150.00 and you were cool again by another company but did they actually do you justice by putting some Freon in knowing its going to leak back out and you will be calling them right back out. We also noticed you said you already had them out once before. So as you can see your having to call someone out every few months to charge your unit mean while when it is running low on Freon it is working double time and costing you double time just to operate the system. It sounds like as much as you are having to pay for a very inefficient  system in your home with multiple service calls a year you could have purchased a new efficient system with just the savings you would have on your utilities each month not to mention all the 150.00 dollar service call. So did Climatemp really do a dis justice or where you just putting a band aid on something that really needed stitches to buy you more time. Climatemp charges by the quarter hr. Which can save you tons of money many other companies charge a 1hr minimum and flat rate prices that would have cost you much more. We are truly sorry for any inconvenience to you or your family but in the same note here at Climatemp we believe in fixing things right and not putting a band on something that will end up costing you much more in the long run. Our deepest regards

text: I’ve used ClimaTemp cooling for the past two years. I’ve always received great service up until this last week. name: David Gamache
text: If I could give zero stars I would. Avoid this place at all costs!  Called them at 8:00 am for an AC repair at my condo. I am told they cannot give me a time but it would be that day. 4:00 pm, phone call stating the Tech is on the way.  4:10, another call asking if Tech was here. Then told, OH OK, he is on the way. 4:50, another call stating Tech was tied up but heading my way.  Nobody ever showed and no further contact. One can only assume there is so much business that they can treat people this way and still survive.  Pathetic.

resp.text: -lease give us a call 251-968-6006

name: Paula Gaubatz
text:
I had an in home estimate with Stan and he sold me on getting a new 16 seer 3 ton unit.  They told me it would be installed the next day and someone would call me around 8am to let me know what time to expect them.  After 9:30am and no phone call, I called and was told they would be here between 11:30am-12pm and it would be about 4-5 hours for the installation.  I called several times after 12pm to find out when someone would be here as I had to take off work to get this done, no one called me back.  Finally, at 3:30pm the guys arrived to install this system.  It was not until 2am that they left, completed the job and drove out of my driveway!  I asked if they could stop and come back the next day and was told no, they were required to finish the job that day.  2am is unacceptable to me, for someone to expect their installers to do a good job at that hour and also when it's not an emergency is beyond me.  I was also told by the installer that the company does this to them all of the time.  I called the next day to talk to the owner and I also emailed him.  I have yet to receive a return call.  I will never recommend this company to anyone.  Wesley was wonderful, very competent and very nice.  The next day, the unit froze up and had to have service repair.  They said the thermostat was not relaying to the fan the correct way and he fixed it and it's been good since.  The installers and service guys seem to know what they are doing, however, the management doesn't and it's evident in their complete lack of correspondence.  The one email I did receive the day of the install was from the owner and it was as though he was yelling at me with his !!!!!! all throughout the email.  Customer service will get you every time and theirs is awful.

After discussing the issues with Stan, I was offered an additional 2 year maintenance agreement.  Stan was very knowledgeable and upfront with me on his visit and Wesley was excellent as an installer.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Climatemp as your A/C provider.

name: Nichole Blevins

name: M. Mace
text: My AC went out on a Sat and kudos to Climatemp for coming out right away.  That's where my good opinion ends. The sales person said the new unit would be eligible for an energy rebate - turned out it wasn't. When I brought the issue up with the owner, he was unhelpful and arrogant.  A few months later, they missed the included maintenance appointment because they claimed not to have my phone number (which was clearly on the paperwork) and when I brought it to their attention, they said it expired and wouldn't honor it. From the start, my summer bills have average about $50 more despite being a bigger more efficient unit. When I had another company service it, they discovered the electrical wiring was not done properly and needed to be redone plus the unit was short 2.5lbs of refrigerant.  Since there were no leaks, it probably hadn't been filled properly from the start (which explains the higher bills). I give them two stars because they came out on a weekend but I would never trust them to install a new HVAC.

resp.text: Please give us a call we would love to help 251-968-6006

name: Cindi Daniels
text: I was very impressed with Phillip the salesman who did not mind that my son was involved with the sales call (via telephone).  Phillip answered my son's questions (my son is affiliated with Trane) and knew the right questions to ask on my behalf.  Once I gave the go ahead, a team came to my house that same afternoon.  They were all courteous, friendly and professional.  It was the fastest turn-around installation I have ever had.

name: Shar B
text: Called them on a Sunday to service my mom's AC unit. They actually came out to assess the problem and returned next morning (just as they said) and fixed the problem completely! I was very pleased with the service and will definitely use their service again.  Oh, and they installed a new HVAC unit in my home in 2017, and I was very pleased with the product and the installation.

name: Erica Miodrag
text: Tech came out to see what needed to be fixed and give me an estimate. He quoted me $11,000 to replace air ducts and new unit inside. My house is only 1,000 square feet. When they called me to set up appointment to get everything fixed, I told them the price was high and going a different direction. The lady on the phone said they could review the quote and get me a better price. I explained to her that the tech should have been honest to begin with. The word gullible is not on my ceiling, just a water spot. They also just loss my business at my work because of this.

name: Dr L
text: Hansen installed HVAC in my old home and maintains my new homes HVAC I have found the to be honest, dependable, professionals, great service value for the money on time and clean up after their work is completed, friendly, explain everything to your satisfaction. Listen to your issue, review your problem then recommend only what you need, give a quote before a repair all techs I have met seem to be very knowledgeable and honest. Hansen sets up and calls me to remind me of seasonal maintenance for my system they have been my HVAC company over 15 years, thanks Hansen D.Lassitter.

text: They were able to come out ASAP and the technician was very nice and explained things thoroughly. Respected my home and cleaned up after themselves. Would highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Chuck Brand
text: We have used them for years to work with a large house on campus and found Hughes & Mullenix to be a great partner. The few times we have had someone try and call a competitor, we have found the quotes/costs to be considerably more, work less professional, and even had another company say a unit needed replaced and would take a week to get the new air conditioning unit. When I found out they had called another company, I had the person call Hughes & Mullenix who was able to fix the issue in one visit for the cost of parts and a service call. I would not use anyone else in Tuscaloosa!

name: Dennis Cosby
text:
Our upstairs AC went out on a Friday evening. After a couple of unsuccessful calls to set up a Monday appointment and reading good reviews for Skelton’s I made an online appointment for AM on Monday to repair one unit and service the other two. First thing Monday I got a call the technician was coming. Jeremy was very professional and we were very pleased with his work.
Definitely will recommend and use in the future.

name: Jake Doughty
text: My A/C quit cooling on a Friday evening and I called Skelton’s on-call number. A technician called me back very quickly and was out to fix the issue in a timely manner. Very knowledgeable and up front with diagnosis and repair.

name: Robert Stewart
text: My experience started when Steve answered the phone.  He was professional, courteous and empathetic. He scheduled my appointment for a tech to arrive within 2 hours of my call. Every minute counts when you're without AC in Alabama in the summer. The tech,  Jeremy, was very friendly,  courteous and professional also. Even more, he was very experienced and quickly diagnosed the issue. Great experience. My recommendation would be to HIRE these guys,  you won't be sorry!

resp.text: Happy to help Robert! Your right - in the heat of Alabama AC is KEY!! Thank you for your 5-star rating!

name: Suzanne Mattox
text: Our AC stopped working Thursday evening. We tried calling several repairmen Friday morning, and no one responded or said that they couldn't do it until next week. Our house was too warm inside and uncomfortable, and we were not looking forward to dealing with heat this coming weekend especially when high temps are in 90s. My husband found this business through the Internet and he contacted them, and they quickly responded. Jacob, one of their technicians, showed up at our house 30 minutes later!  He was able to repair it by replacing a part. He was honest and professional. And, it was affordable to get it repaired!  We were very pleased!  😀

resp.text: We appreciate your 5-star rating!

name: Donald
text:
Kevin Keith did a superb job of analysis, servicing and maintaining of my systems using the most modern tools and techniques. His knowledge, equipment and dedication to his work are first rate.

Kurtis and his team did an excellent job of installing my new HVAC system.  The installation correctly included the use of a vacuum pump and the installation of a liquid line drier.  Then the system was very carefully charged with refrigerant and thoroughly tested.

resp.text: Thank you for your positive review and rating Donald!

I have also been in contact with Tony who is the one that laid out the system for our new home and he is very knowledgeable about everything that he does.

name: Chris Robinson
text: It was honestly a really great experience from start to finish. My wife met with Cason and we went into wanting multiple options which i thought were all fairly presented and well explained without any pressure of which to go with. I have a close friend who worked for many years for both Trane and Carrier with many of the dealers throughout Birmingham. He gave me a list of 3 companies he would have out to his home personally. Skelton was one of those, another company that i liked very much, and then one we didnt have a great experience on the quote with. Between Skelton and the other competitor, although Skeltons price was higher we were sold by the labor warranty and some of the other written guarantees, along with the rec from our friend. Installation - I believe it was Mark, my wife was the one on site - went way better than i could have imagined. We arranged last minute to have the unit moved to a new location. All of the work was very well done. I had an idea in my head of what "the aftermath" should have looked like and the equipment involved in the move and all that, and i probably would have been satisfied with a lot less. Its obviously a lot of money for most families, so I was bound to have some mix of buyers remorse and hesitation about whether or not we'd gone with the right people However, when i got home and saw the quality of the work, how neatly and efficiently and professionally everything was done, i immediately felt entirely confident in our decision and knew we had some true professionals out at the house. I think its the first time in my life ive spent that much money on something and dont have any regrets or second guessing about who we chose to spend it with. Kudos to both Cason and Mark's teams. Thanks yall!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! Our technicians have our customers satisfaction in mind and we are happy they were able to meet your needs!

name: Kayla Ingram
text: Jacob was on time, professional, and extremely helpful. He replaced the HVAC compressor and answered all of my questions about the process.

text: John is very professional, knowledgeable and a real asset to your company. In addition, such a genuinely nice person. Great Company + Great Employees = A “Win Win!”

text: The experience with Skelton was AAA throughout.  The phone personnel were friendly and very helpful.  When I changed my request from replacement estimate to repair due to medical situation, they didn’t miss a beat.  The technician arrived and was courteous and totally efficient.  They were to replace a control panel for over $200 less than a competing service without trying to upswell us.  Overall the service was excellent+++.

text: A/C stopped working right before noon today and we could not be happier with the response Skelton's staff delivered.  They were very quick, affordable, and understanding to our needs.  Thanks to Jacob for a job well done.  Skelton's saved the day!!

text: Great experience. The staff was highly responsive and courteous.  They made me feel assured that we were going to be taken care of. They updated me frequently on arrival time. The technician was conscientious (masked up and shoe booties)  and clearly knowledgeable as he was able to diagnose and repair within a pretty short timeframe. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you, Ms. Reese for the wonderful review and that you had a great experience with our staff! We appreciate you choosing Skelton's for your HVAC needs!

text: Excellent service. Have used them for many years. They get the job done and keep the equipment up. One dealer and product you can trust. Take it from me.

name: Louis Dina
text: Skelton's Heating, Cooling and Refrigeration just installed a new AC, furnace and air handler in our upstairs attic (difficult job getting it all in an our up a set up rickety pull-down stairs). They were responsive, polite, respectful, did a quality job, were on time and professional in every way. They did a great job cleaning up, like they were never here. They also use Trane equipment which is good quality and highly rated. Their prices were competitive and they did great work. I'm hard to impress, but they impressed me. Thanks for the great job. Oh yeah, 10 year warranty on parts and labor is standard if you pay cash.

name: Rance Pearce
text: Very happy with Skelton’s. They came out today and installed a new 3 unit. They were very polite and very helpful. I would highly recommend them to anyone. They have one happy customer 😂😂

resp.text: Mr. Pearce, thank you for choosing Skelton's for your new install. We appreciate your recommendation!

name: Andy Widener
text:
I don’t write reviews but these guys are really professional. On time; nice tight work; the installers took pride in their work & cleaned up afterward. Salesman was clear, precise & brief - no wasted time “up-selling”. We got what we needed & got it installed quickly - less than 3 hours.

I was surprisingly pleased (as I am usually cynical about such endeavors).

resp.text: Mr. Widener, thank you for the excellent review. We are pleased to know that you had a great experience using Skelton's for your HVAC install!

name: Michelle Gigis
text: Excellent experience with Skelton's! The technician was very thorough and discussed all the options with me. He was professional and extremely knowledgeable. This is now my go to company for all of my heating, cooling and refrigeration needs. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Ms. Gigis, thank you for taking the time to give Skelton's an amazing review! We strive to give our customer's an excellent experience and are happy to hear that you were pleased!

name: David Reed
text: Great maintenance service for the money and worth it to prevent unplanned downtime. Very methodical in their service and you need to take care of your 5-10k$ investment so it can take care of your family! No pushy sales games and they take care of your property.

resp.text: We appreciate you choosing Skelton's Heating & Air, David! So happy you are letting us take care of your investment. Let us know if you need anything!

name: Patrick McDonald
text: I had scheduled an estimate on Wednesday, June 10 8-9 a.m. Estimator showed up on Thursday, 8 a.m. to perform the estimate. Estimate was done without measuring, or even going under the house. I have zero confidence that the estimate is accurate; I felt like the estimator was simply seeing how much he could get out of me. No detail on the estimate i received. Just got the total dollar figure that seems about 3x higher than it should be. With the time he spent, he really pulled the numbers out of his hat (or some other place).

resp.text: Thank you Patrick for your feedback. We are very sorry that your recent experience was not a pleasant one. We strive to provide great service and when we fall short of this we try to do everything we can to resolve the issue. Again, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and hope you will give us another chance to make things right. Please give us a call at 205-991-5878 and ask for Chad.

text: They were fantastic. I can't recommend highly enough.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Skelton's for your HVAC needs! We appreciate you!

But otherwise a very good experience! Definitely will be using them again.

name: Louis Dina
text: My 15 year old AC unit was recharged about 5 weeks ago. When it stopped working again, I assumed all the Freon leaked out again and that it needed replacement. I asked Skelton’s to give a quote on a replacement unit. Their technician was very thorough and discovered a bad switch and capacitor, which he replaced on the spot. He checked our Freon levels and said they were still perfect. His extra effort and honesty saved us from having to buy a new unit at this time, even though he could have easily convinced me we needed a new unit. (Two other companies also provided quotes on new units, but neither of them discovered the underlying issue.) Honesty and integrity, and a desire to serve the customer’s best interests, are important to me. Skelton’s proved it by their actions. When it is time for a replacement AC system, I’ll call Skelton’s.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience! We appreciate the review and your business.

text: Can’t recommend this company enough. David went above and beyond to make sure the problem was fixed. They work fast and are VERY trustworthy. 5 stars.

name: Jay Miller
text:
My 94 year old Dad's AC system went out on a Thursday afternoon in rural Alabama with the heat index well over 100. Justin promptly called me back and was out to check the system before the end of business that same day. The entire system had to be replaced so it couldnt be resolved that day. Justin lined up Wes and his crew so that they could begin the replacement first thing once the system was delivered. I was told everything would be good to go by 1pm. My Dad and I arrived at 12pm and Wes told me all they needed was access to the thermostat and they would be finished. This group understood the critical situation my Dad was in and went above and beyond to make sure his unit was installed and operating ASAP.
Thank you so much guys...you'll never know how much it meant to my Dad to get back to his home.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Miller for the great review! We are happy to hear about your that you were pleased with job and technicians. Thanks again for choosing Skelton's Heating & Air.

name: Goodoz
text: David showed up on same day as original call and diagnosed my problem.  He priced and ordered a part for me (collected payment) and arrived back at my home first thing the next morning.  AC was back on by 10AM.  Skelton replaced my upstairs AC a few years back and did a good job (crew began and finished same day)...so I called them back for this repair...another good experience.

name: Jack Lyle
text:
It seems punctuality is lost on many service businesses these days, but that's not the case with Skelton's!  They arrived when they said they would for a quote on a new heating and a/c system and did the same two days later when they came to install my new system.

I was very pleased with the pricing for a new system and the installation was performed by a professional crew who put pride in their work.  They did not try to sell me things that I didn't need and there were no surprises.
I paid exactly what I was quoted.

They will  get all my HVAC work from now on.  I highly recommend Skelton's!

text: Installed new TRANE heat pump. On time and with enough resources to accomplish the task.  Improved the existing setup and completed the job in about five hours.  Walked us through all the install process and the new control panel. Very professional, as usual. Would recommend to anyone.  THANKS!!

text: We are very pleased with the service and new installation from Skelton’s. Since our Trane unit was 21 years old, we opted for replacement.  Installers Cody and Mike had our new unit installed and tested in a few hours.  They reviewed system and thermostat functioning with us and could not have been more friendly and professional.  They cleaned up afterwards and we are enjoying the cool air! Thanks guys!

name: Doug Tilt
text:
I remodeled a room in my lake house which required repositioning the main intake vent from a vertical in -wall position to an in-floor register.  Brian Skelton , company owner, came out the day after my call, evaluated the job and provided a best guess estimate for the proposed task
The following day a team of two technicians  arrived at 0800 , as agreed. Within 4 hours the old vent box was removed, a new floor frame between the joists was constructed, a new box placed and large duct connected to the existing AC/ Heating unit and new ,sturdy floor grate placed( and thermostat repositioned)

The Skelton team were most professional and efficient.  The job site was completely cleaned and everything double checked to be sure everything was done to my satisfaction and functioning well. An immediate follow up call to me by company owner was appreciated.

The total cost was $960.00 based on labor and materials , which was as expected per initial estimate

My five star rating was completely deserved based on professionalism, punctuality, job done, and charge. I definitely recommend this company and will use them again.

Doug Tilt

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review for our company! It was our pleasure to assist you on your project.

text:
We have a quadriplegic living here and one of our central units,  the one in his suite, stopped colling last night. He is temperature sensitive and it is critical to keep his temperature stable in his area. I called SHELTON Air and Heat, this is Saturday morning,  and John a Technician answered.  I explained the situation, told him the model number of out Trane unit. He said he was on his way to a call and come after. Hff e called and ssid he was on his way. He arrived,  called to tell me and I told him i wiuld be diwn in 5 minutes  and told him which of the 5 Trane units it was. I was worried about the length of time hff e would be here an DC tge cost, especially since it was a weekend. I came down, not over 5 minutes later, he was replacing the capacitor on the unitand was finished 5 minutes later!
John was courteous,  honest, trustworthy,  and prompt. He could  have taken his time, running up labor time but just did his job efficiently.
I will definitely be using Skeleton Heating and Air for or all my AC/HEATING needs. . Thank you Mr. Skelton for having honest and efficient technicians!  Thank you John fir getting the unit up nb and runing so quickly!

text:
We arranged to have the annual SAM plan for safety and inspection of Cooling/Heating, Electrical, and Plumbing maintenance.  We also had the  iWave system installed.  The service techs that visited were all very professional, courteous, efficient, knowledgeable and most helpful.  Rick, Frank, and Alex were amazing.  The iWave speaks for itself (cleaner, fresher air!) and has lived up to its assertions and more. We have referred several friends to purchase and they have had the same positive experience.

Since initial inspection under the Same plan, we had need of a plumbing visit.  The techs were very thorough in their attempts to identify and resolve the issue, but unfortunately were not successful, perhaps due to the initial construction installation and lay out of the plumbing system, which sadly would be too involved to resolve.

We would give the Hansen group the max star ratings in all areas and would not hesitate to refer with confidence.

name: Jenny Ladnier
text: From our first interaction with a service call late in the evening to the installation of our new unit everything was wonderful. The guys that arrived and took care of everything were more than professional. Phillip was our tech who came on the service call. He was super respectful and helpful. I appreciate everyone at this company and their professionalism.

name: Gene Eaves
text: Very professional and courteous. Explained service work and answered my questions. I would highly recommend Hansen Heating & Air Conditioning

name: Andrew Brymer
text: Hansen was very prompt in scheduling my AC installation as well as the actual installation. Very respectful of my home and very professional. My only possible complaint would be that a couple of small items that were quoted weren’t performed, such as replacing the wooden platform my interior air handler rested on. Other than that, I’d recommend Hansen!

name: Charles Harper
text:
The serviceman from Hansen came the same day that I called and did an excellent job. He diagnosed the problem and let us know the cost. After he finished he was in the den and I was talking to my wife about an issue with some new furniture that was just delivered. The young man asked what the problem was and fixed the issue quickly. I thought he was very considerate and certainly went beyond the call of duty.
Hansen has a wonderful and professional group of folks.
Charlie

name: Karen Lucek
text: Ricky was on time as per our conversation before arrival. He was thorough in his inspection. He took the time to explain and show me what the issues are and what work is needed. I am confident in Hansen's expertise.

name: Tory Bray
text: I have used Hansen Heating & Air several times over the years. They have always been professional, courteous and knowledgeable. Efficient at pinning down the issue and resolving it in a timely manner. I would recommend them!

name: Shanavia White
text: very satisfied with the service we recieved.  Tech responsed timely and fixed  problem with ducts. The price was was well within my budget. Now we are enjoying the pleasure of a cool house during these extremly hot summer day. Thanks Hansen. Job well done.

name: Brian Lovrey
text: I cannot speak highly enough about Hansen Heating & Air. Every one of heir employees was courteous & friendly & the quality of their work is outstanding. They were very neat and tidy with everything they did and they were extremely efficient. It was an absolute pleasure to deal with  this company.

name: Cynthia Blake
text: Jason Martin for diagnostics along with Aaron and his crew for install can't be beat. Over 100 with the heat index, same day as I placed the call and these guys finish in less than 3 hours. Very professional, friendly,  super tidy, and made sure the job was done right. I'm getting ready to sleep comfortably at a cool 70 degrees and that is priceless.

name: Betty Murdock
text: My experience with Hansen has always been professional. They were on time and did a great job and clean up was great. Reasonably priced also. Would recommend them.

name: Carol Zambrano
text: Right off the bat, calling in and scheduling was easy, reps were nice and professional. The whole office communicates with you and I am very pleased. They were very responsive and the install techs were professional and informative.

name: Sherrie Byron
text: No problems nice people cheaper than most a.c. companies will use from now on.

name: Beth Power
text: Fast scheduling through a friendly office staff, and the service call was right on time too! Excellent work. Highly recommend.

name: Dale Davis
text: Thank you so much for helping us, gave you guys a call and by 8 last night my house was cool. You guys came back today to do some more work for me. Thank you so much!!!

name: Raja Mahtani
text:
This company is very prompt reliable and trustworthy
They understand the importance of solving the problem so that their clients can be comfortable.
I have and will recommend to my friends and family

name: Chantrell Amey
text: They are always professional. The price is affordable. They are opening 24 hours and always on call. I have use them for about 10 years or more.

name: Joseph Behr
text:
Preformed preventative maintenance on my standby generator and replaced the battery. The technician was very professional; he arrived as scheduled, explained the need to replace the battery in my generator along with the tests he performed.

Would definitely use their services in the future.

name: Tristan Wedge
text: Hansen did an amazing job fixing our AC unit! They were on time, professional and did a great job getting our unit back up and running! Thank y’all.

name: Larry Saranthus
text: Competitive pricing but more importantly they were punctual and professionally completed the Mitsubishi split system in a timely manner. Follow up service is commendable!

name: Barri Perez
text: I absolutely love Hansen we use them for all of our rental properties, as well as, our personal home.  I recommend them every chance I get.

name: Brian Fletcher
text: Hansen Heating & Air is fantastic. I have been using their services for years. They are reliable, friendly, affordable, and always deliver the highest quality services.

name: Mary DeWise
text: The technicians were courteous and very efficient.

name: Jackie DeWaal
text: I only use this company because they are professional, honest and trustworthy.  Best in the area.

name: Wes Harless
text: A/C started acting up only hours before I had renters scheduled to come in. Hansen got a technician out to me in less than an hour during peak season! They had it fixed several hours earlier than the other companies could even get someone to show up. They will be my go to for any repairs moving forward.

name: cessna151
text: So far I have bought 4 a/c units, and a home generator from Hansen. They all work great, and I am very pleased.

name: Randy Quinn
text: Drain was stopped, required "blowing out". Problem was diagnosed immediately and repaired efficiently, but cost was beyond excessive: $295 for clearing drain is outrageous, especially for repeat customer.

name: Hayden Dudley
text: Great value, very fast response time, and my HVAC system is now up and running perfectly.

name: Kayla Mowdy, DPT
text: We began having AC problems early June and called 2 other places and were given times several days out for a tech to come check it. Hansen was there within 30 minutes of our call (just a little after 5pm on a Thursday) and diagnosed our unit. We ended up needing a replacement and got a brand new unit installed first thing the next day.

name: Curt Crider
text: They have always been reliable and professional and the work has always been done right the first time.

name: johnny goodwin
text: This was a great experience from the first call I made to the tech arriving and fixing ac unit, the tech was very knowledgeable and told me exactly what was wrong and had it fixed within 30 minutes of arriving!

name: Michael Hoskins
text: Service was prompt and efficient. Ricky did a great job. Already signed up to use them again.

name: Patti McPherson
text: Repairmen came out day I called and super nice which was great.  However, they didn’t fix my heating problem first go around.  $95 to come diagnose the problem(spent time looking at the unit) $50 to process warranty for part covered then $95 to come back to install part.  Appeared to be working when I left the same day returning home the next day found house freezing and heater not working again.  It appears part replaced was not the issue.  So, Needless to say I’m not happy.  Let’s see if I’m charged again for service call and repair! Currently waiting for them to come back to look at the problem again. They did come back and fixed the problem with no additional charge.  Satisfied customer!

name: Dayna Hurst
text: They have always gave us the best service!

name: Clark Kelly
text: They did a nice job with my commercial HVAC requirement

name: Scott Lewis
text: Once again great service!   I love how they go the extra mile cleaning after themselves!

name: Karen Hong
text: Very good services before and post installation

name: Sue Ryan
text: Very professional, efficient...very impressed

name: broomegar
text: Came to replace capacitor late one hot evening.

name: Gen Proctor
text: I am new to Alabama and this was my second time to use Hansen Heating and Air. This was my first time to have to call out on the weekend because my AC went out. It was this past weekend in the middle of a storm with extremely heavy winds and rain. I could not believe that I was able to get someone the same day but was even more amazed that they responded in about an hour. They are always polite, extremely careful of surroundings by wearing shoe covers,etc. after checking my inside unit he went out in the storm, I offered an umbrella but he didn’t need it. In a few minutes I saw him walk to his truck. I thought he was writing a bill so I asked how much. He came to the door and showed me that my breaker was burned up and how much hot it was. It would burn your hand if you held it. I was surprised he had a breaker for my unit and was able to install it so quickly. The charge for the service call, travel, weekend inconvenience, repair and parts was less than I paid for a service call in my last state. Donnie was so knowledgeable, professional and fast that I couldn’t begin to give him enough stars. I said the first time I used Hansen that I would never use anyone else. This was definitely a great find. Hsnsen’s Is by far the best company I have dealt with. I have already began advertising to my community how great they are. I am definitely a customer for life. Thank you so much Donnie.

name: Walter Garrett
text: Awesome service and professionalism! I would highly recommend.

name: Brad Albrecht
text: Very fast service.

name: derya doster
text: They were good.

name: Janice Mccants
text: The technician is friendly, professional, punctual, and doesn't mind if I ask a question. Really, from the time that you call Hansen until the time the technician leaves your home after he is finished, EVERYBODY IS FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL. And they are a lot cheaper than my previous AC Service. I told the old company to take my name out of their COMPUTER.

name: Paul Darnell
text: Very professional Installation on time And left our condo very clean

name: Tommy Reynolds
text: Great fast responses to repair your issues. They fix the problem right away, and don't do the old you need a complete system like some others do when you just need a capacitor or fuse. The staff are friendly and are quick to answer all questions. They are the only ones that I will call for all my work

name: James Barnard
text: The best company I have ever used will recomend thanks

name: Hope Dunn
text: Thank you Kevin ,Robert and his crew. Excellent service.  Would recommend them again and to all my friends.

name: Greg Seelye
text: Very dependable.

name: Bruce Barrett
text:
I've lived in Orange Beach for over 20 years and, until now, had yet to find a truly good HVAC company. My consistent experience with perhaps six other A/C companies has been over-charging and up-selling. Example: one local business charged me $236 to replace an $8 part in 17 minutes.
-
Hansen Heating & Air is a breath of fresh air. Technician Mason was great. He diagnosed, explained, verified, and corrected the problem in less than 10 minutes. And for such a quick fix, I was charged only the VERY reasonable service call/diagnostic cost. They now have another lasting customer.
-
This licensed local business, with very fast service on a hot weekend, is a 5-star GO TO company. I highly recommend anybody needing A/C or Heating service to call them first.

name: Kimberly Anderson
text: Michael was prompt in returning our call and was accurate on his estimated time of arrival. He was very courteous and professional. Took took time to explain things we needed to know and some preventative maintenance.  We had used this business before and definitely will again.

name: Matt Spradley
text:
The best HVAC I have ever seen. Friendly and very polite. Courteous and fast. I will definitely call these guys for the next HVAC problem I have.
Thanks

name: Zina C
text: Every time I call the receptionists are very friendly, courteous, and professional. The technicians are professional, thorough and knowledgeable. A job well done.

name: Judith Mogavero
text: Troy came out to our house pretty quick this morning! Only reason I gave 4 stars was the fact that he came in and left quick with a possible diagnosis of replacing the fan blade or an issue with the motor of our outdoor AC unit. Professional, nice and  Hansen offers an affordable call fee.

name: Beth K
text: Friendly professional service every time

name: Mary Bama
text: Starting with the receptionist who answered the service call to the timeliness of the service call was excellent professionalism.  The serviceman Chris was friendly, knowledgable and efficient and went above and beyond to explain the problem. He worked quickly and provided information about the company and I opted to secure a yearly service arrangement due to his professionalism and knowledge. I could not be happier with choosing this company and will endorse them anytime. Thru Chris i also found out they service electricity issues and plumbing as well so this is good company to have immediate as access to. Thank you, Hansen and Chris. Excellent service.

name: Brenda Strickler
text: Repairman was excellent

name: Chris Stewart
text: Everyone that works for this company is absolutely amazing! Highly recommend contacting them if you are ever in need

name: Scootie Dabbs
text: The guys were friendly, knowledgeable, fast and efficient. They not only gave me an accurate diagnosis but a very fair quote to replace my unit, came out quickly and were in and out, completely cleaned up in a VERY reasonable amount of time! Highly recommend!

name: Terry Jordan
text: We called these guys to our condo in Orange Beach and they were there within an hour. They got our AC back going and got us cooled off very fast. The technician was friendly and explained the issue to us while he was there. Fast friendly service at a great price! Thanks guys!

name: Johnice Shumaker
text: Super nice ppl & very thorough...& dog friendly! Having been using them for 3yrs & very pleased with their work !

name: Charles Worley
text: The tech that came out was Professional!!! Knows what he is doing and can do. Highly recommend Hansen's to my Family and Friends!!! Most impressed with company from office staff to tech and how fast they were out to my house. I will have them out anytime A/C work is needed. C.Worley

name: Hal Womble
text: Hansen's service is superb. Jason was on-time, courteous, and Super-knowledgeable about our system ! I know we can count on them to take care of our H & A needs.

name: Tom Harris
text: Hunter arrived within two hours after the initial call to Hansen. He quickly diagnosed the problem, retrieved a new part from his truck, and was on to his next call in under an hour. Great service and very much appreciated. A big thanks to Hansen!

name: Karen Williams
text: Every year I receive Hansen Heating and Air refrigerator magnet; so when our air went out I called Hansen Heating and Air. The lady who answered the phone was very nice and explained that a technician would be calling us soon. Sure enough shortly afterwards, Donnie called and said he would be there in forty-five minutes. He was right on time and diagnosed the problem immediately.  He didn’t have the replacement part in his van, but he called around to other technicians and found one.  He left and came back with the proper replacement part. Donnie was respectful, knowledgeable, and efficient. I give Hansen Heating and Air FIVE stars! Thanks for your quick service on a LABOR DAY weekend.

name: Willie Cannon
text: Very good service

name: Bobby Williams
text: Hansen always offers prompt service at a reasonable price.  I've used them for over 10 years and have never been disappointed.

name: J Jones
text: Very prompt and professional. Performed all work describe in quote to the last detail. Would recommend.

name: Alexander Lam
text: I have always reached out to them for my A/C repair needs. Very prompt and knowledgeable techs. Highly recommend!

name: B Sledge
text: The technician was very nice and professional, but when I later realized how overcharged I was for the service provided, it left me feeling taken advantage of, and not wanting to use this company for any further AC services.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm so sorry that your experience with us fell short of expectations. Please feel free to reach out to marketing@hansenair.com with any further comments, concerns, or suggestions you wish to share. We would love to make things right.

name: Peg
text: Best service ever!  So glad we selected Hansen to repair our old system and then to upgrade and install our new HVAC.  Service tech was punctual, polite and efficient.  Thanks, Brett!

name: Daniel Hellman
text: Great service (7 days a week if needed). Great prices and very knowledgeable and friendly staff.

name: William E. Workman
text: Very pleased with the professional work that Mason, Donnie and crew did in installing our new heat pump.  You should be very proud to have such talented men in your company.

name: Barbara Bryant
text: They have always been great, love the service they provide! Kind of pricey, but worth it! They get to you when they say and do the job right!

name: DC Cooper
text: Than you so much for the prompt and very knowledgeable courteous -  repair on my a/c this Alabama & holiday weekend!   Will refer you company to all

name: Shaun Edwards
text: A/C went out on a Sunday evening. A repairman showed up within an hour. Great service.

name: Sharon Biel
text:
Mason was Super and so nice!!  He got right out, took care of the problem on a Friday.   Mason and Hansen Company is Awesome!!
Thanks to the entire team!

name: Sheila Little
text: They were very fast getting to my home and fixed the problem quickly. Phillip was nice and professional

name: wayne phillips
text: Great company friendly staff. Best service ever.

name: Doug Walley

name: Thomas Lang
text: On time and provided the service requested. Excellent value and provided additional information that saved time and money.

name: G. B. Jackson
text: They came out within a couple of hours and identified the problem. Just waiting for them to get the part and come back to replace it.

name: Bert Ward
text: Service man was professional, through and did his work with speed and integrity.

name: Susan Brause
text: We are very happy with the service and respect and efficiency of Mason's work. Thank you!

name: Bob Trachsler
text: I have been using Hansen for both my home and rental property.  Always professional,  always thorough and very reasonably priced.

name: Adam Boehm

name: JESSICA DAVISON
text: They are a wonderful company!! Always offering to help. You can count on them to be there for any problem you're having.

name: Randall Clark sr.

name: Marlene James
text: All I can say is these guys rock!! We have used them for our AC and plumbing and they are just awesome!! Thank you.

name: Nathan Jenkins
text: I'm in civil construction and surveying. As a result I come across Hansen heating and air multiple times at different job sites. They're always fast, neat and very professional.

name: bobbie smith
text: Awesome company very friendly

name: Lynne Cary
text: Not a good company. I had to file a complaint with the state board after an installation.

name: M E Sharkey
text: Support local business.

name: Beth D
text: Roll Tide Hansen!!

name: Ken Bryars
text: Came home from church to a warm house ... air running but not cooling. Called Island Air (on a Sunday) ... the technician called to let me know he had me in his queue ... would be there in about an hour. Came and discovered a small frog had grounded the capacitor in the outside unit which fried the capacitor and frog. Replaced the capacitor, and had my A/C back up and running. Island Air exceeded my expectation, and was very pleased with the timely service and quick diagnostic/repair ... I give them 5 stars!

name: Patty King
text: As always, quality workmanship. The gentleman explained what he had done, and why.   Will use again and recommend to others.  Thank you.

name: Blake Norris
text: Our 21 year old ac bit the dust in July and the crew at Island Air had us up and running within 48 hours of us contacting them. They had quite a few options available to us that they walked us through the process. The unit they installed has been going strong for a year now. It controls humidity so we don’t keep the air as low as we used to which saves $$ on the power bill.  Professional and expeditious. Would recommend them to anyone!

name: Eric Bradley
text: Showed up when we couldn’t find anyone else to get serviced. Technician was there within a couple hours and fixed the problem and had great suggestions for future problems. Great experience!

name: James Pearse
text: Very prompt with regard to appointment time.  Technician was very polite and knowledgeable.  Researched system to identify problem as well as other, non critical item that was not impacting system performance at present or in future.  We are a new customer to Island Air and definitely use them for future HVAC needs.  Highly recommend Island Air to anyone having the need for. AC services.  Condo Owner at Phoenix on the Bay!

name: Angela Wiley
text: Amazing service!  Had a tech in my area who actually came the same day. Tech did a fantastic job and the price was more than fair.

name: Missy Tyler
text: Island Air has been our Heating & Air Conditioning company for over a decade on two properties. When we have needed repairs, their team members show up and repair things quickly.  New installations have been great experiences too. In the heat of the Summer we walk into our cool home and say, “Thank you, Island Air!”

name: Charlene Harris
text: Happy to do business with Island AC and Heating. They were on time and the gentleman that showed up was polite.  We were hit hard by “Sally” , the hurricane. We had some Sheetrock hung and he noticed there was no return air vent. So I went to a department store and purchased a return air grill.  So glad they sent Jason!!!

name: Tina Greene
text: Travis and Jason are my heroes!!  A/c went out in our condo with guests staying there. They went above and beyond, tracked down the part we needed and air was working within 7 hours of the initial phone call this morning.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

name: Don Sterling
text: Well done! Called Friday afternoon with an AC unit not cooling. Despite the late hour, Jennifer still found time to dispatch a crew to my house before the weekend. Jayson arrived about a half hour later. He found the problem within minutes, replacing a faulty capacitor. I’m very grateful for their rapid response time and quick turnaroud time. Thanks again!

name: Cody Hall
text: Great job! Steven was the most helpful AC guy I have ever been around. This experience was an educational one and I would recommend him to anyone struggling with AC issues.

name: Anna Santos
text: My tech was very knowledgeable. This is the only company I have use for more than 20 years. The service has only gotten better.

name: Don Kilbourne
text: They have the best service department and service advisors in Baldwin County.  The field team and their management have superior technically expertise, and they can explain their diagnostics and solutions clearly in everyday language.

name: Brenda Westby
text: The motor went out on our HVAC. They came after hours to try get it running. They were prompt and professional and had it ordered, repaired, and running a day earlier than we expected because of the 4th of July weekend. Highly recommend this company!

name: Ben Emerson
text: I deal in Real Estate and use island air exclusively. They sent two technicians Cody and Travis out to diagnose an issue with my downstairs ac. They arrived 5 min before the appointment. Spent 15 min diagnosing the issue. Fixed and then Explained the problem to me and layer out how to handle the unit in the future. It was raining so as the lead guy is talking to me the other tech swept up the dirt they tracked in from going in and out. Five stars, 20 out of 10 would reccomend to anyone.

name: Shiva Harney
text:
Dependable. It’s a number 1 problem in many home service business as repair, installation, building, renovation, etc.
They will call if they are running late but normally on time.
Did a great job on many area we needed a service for.
Highly recommend this company.

name: Allison Eastland
text: Quick service on fairly short notice.  Jason was quick to address our problem and give us a reasonable solution.  Recommend them highly!

name: Bill Newsom
text: Jayson did a great job, knew what was wrong, made the necessary repairs and had the air operating within a few minutes. He was also very courteous and professional. I recommend this company.

name: bsonier100
text: Came out on July 4 for someone who wasn’t even a customer.    Fixed my problem and now have a new customer!   Awesome service.  Was at my unit 20 minutes after the call out

name: Carolyn Adams
text: Jason does a great job!!!  This company is so responsive, only positive comments about Island Air.  Been a customer 16 years…..always happy with their service!

name: Connie Harbor
text: Once again, Island Air to the rescue! Turned on the AC for the first time since Sally repairs last year, but nothing happened. Called Island Air (my go-to for all things HVAC), expecting the worst. Diagnosis? Wiring had been disconnected when damaged crawlspace insulation was replaced after Sally. Prompt, dependable, reliable and honest. GS and OB are fortunate to have them. Thanks, guys.

name: Steven Schaming
text: The A/C stopped working about 4:00 pm on a 90° Saturday. I called Island Air and Jason the tech called me back in 5 minutes. He gave me a tip to get the A/C running again until he could get here, (which worked!)  and he was here in about an hour and a quarter. He took care of the problem and checked the unit over in about a half hour. We’ll done!

name: Eric Johnson
text: Had a spare thermostat on truck to use temporarily.  Made for a much better experience versus waiting on new one to ship without working AC.

name: tfgrey86
text: We could not be happier with the service we have always received from Island Air. Jason (our technician) is extremely professional and courteous and a pleasure to work with. Highly recommend!

name: Steven Odom
text: Service was great! I been using this company throughout the years. I would recommend this service.

name: Bob Swayze
text: Island Air installed our system and services it every six months. This is the first time we have asked them to come out the day before a holiday weekend due to a thermostat problem. They came out 7 hours after I called on a Friday. Derick resolved the problem and could not have been more professional. Impressive!

name: C J Morgan
text: Island Air does a great job keeping our house cool and comfortable!!! Our service man, Danny, is always professional and knows what he is doing. We are happy to recommend this company.

name: J E N N Y • A N T H O N Y
text: They have always responded quickly and professionally! I would highly recommend them.

name: Ronda Herndon
text: Prompt, very nice, great quality work and keeps us cool! Highly recommend!

name: Shirley Mccabe
text: Always efficient,  professional,  and friendly.   Highly recommend this company.

name: Bob Forapples
text: Service from Island Air was outstanding as always, this time especially delivered by an expert tech in Jayson B. who took an extra step in correcting an aggravating sound issue to complete the job.  He is a pro who knows his stuff and a huge asset to the company.  Thank you, Jayson!

name: Uilma Meehan
text: Best AC company in the Gulf Coast! They are fast and the work quality is excellent.

name: Lori Lacewell
text: I purchased a rental property and wanted to make sure everything was in working order for guests. They came out within 24 hours changed everything out and explained where everything was, and answered all the questions I had. Great experience will use them again!

name: Bibb Lamar
text: The crew arrived on time, worked well together, made sure the system was working properly before leaving, cleaned up after themselves, answered questions and explained the new equipment to my satisfaction. They did a great job!

name: Houston B
text: My only complaint is that their computer accidentally scheduled me 12 hours after I intended to be serviced. Aside from that their AC tech was polite, professional, and he did a great Job. I have my AC back and I'm so thankful!

name: Karen Fallon
text: I have used Island Air 3 or 4 times since 2015 for my condo in GS.They are the best!  Very prompt and knowledgeable.  Thanks Island Air for the great service.  I also highly recommend y’all to friends & family 😊

name: Dan Stacks
text: Travis provided great service. Went above and beyond. I highly recommend them.

name: Ron Stone
text: I've use Island Air for several years now. Nice that there are still professionals that want to ensure everything is done correctly and at a fair price.

name: Adam Lyons
text: The gentlemen took a VERY detailed look at my DIY Mr Cool mini-split. Though we didn't get it working, the work was thorough and i look forward to them handling all my AC needs, and replacing this low quality minisplit!

name: ELLIS ATKINSON
text: Professional and and friendly service at a reasonable price.

name: Michael Ramanauskas
text: Timely and professional. Diagnosed problem quickly. Price was very reasonable.

name: Debby Danner
text: Island Air is awesome-prompt and efficient and they ALWAYS solve the issue. We’ve hired them for years and will continue  to do so.

name: Lydia Birkhoff
text: Punctual and efficient service.  Very satisfied with work performed.

name: Wayne Harbin
text:
Jayson did a excellent job.
Very professional and courteous

name: Rosa Turner
text:
Came within 2 hours of me calling on a Friday afternoon. Resigned to thinking I would have to suffer all weekend (and Monday being Labor Day)! It was 88 degrees in the house at this time. Did not have the equipment to fix the problem on Friday. Another employee came this morning and got my AC up and running in less than an hour. Temperature went from 91 to 86 in about 20min. Still dropping. It was an awful night. Slept with the back door open and 3 ceiling fans running continuously. Never take cool/cold air for granted in the summertime at the beach!
Both young men were sympathetic, friendly, and professional. Would recommend Island Air to anyone. They were recommended to me by a neighbor.

name: Jane Lee
text: Always on time. Always efficient. Been a customer fir 11 years. Stand behind their work. Have had a couple issues but they ALWAYS made it right!!

name: Daniel Hart
text: Very thankful.  Island air was on top of my repair on short notice during prime season.  I didn't find out about air not cooling from guests  until 4 in the afternoon. Island scrambled even with a very busy schedule to get things up and running within 2 hours.  Great service. Reasonable rates and professional.  Great teamwork.  Thank you!

name: Ken Baird
text: I have relied on Island Air for over ten years to take care of my HVAC issues at our condo in Orange Beach. They are prompt, knowledgeable and professional.

name: Brandon Hanks
text: New customer with Island Air. They have a comprehensive maintenance program servicing HVAC systems. Angie answered all my questions and provided insight on specific tests performed.

name: Paula Pierce
text:
My system stopped cooling,  on a hot August day. I called to set up an appointment. Island Air came within the hour and replaced a battery in my system. They were very nice, and fixed my problem immediately!!

Today is Friday, June 26, 2020. I called to set up an annual check on my heat/air system. Island Air sent Ricky to our house and the service was great! He explained and answered any questions we had. He found moisture build up, black gunk, growing. We immediately requested him to install a filtration system, that he recommended. This will kill any growth and filter the air.  A definite plus when you have a lung condition!  We are very appreciative that Island  Air Employees are well trained, kind, efficient,  and care about their customers!! Thanks Ricky for going the extra mile! We will definitely breathe better
tonight!!

Tom and Paula Pierce

text:
This company was hired to inspect the ac in my home prior to moving in. I was told it was all in working order.
The inspection was done on February 5th. I moved in on February 14th. I called today, April 27th bc the air is not cooling in part of the house. It didn't even begin to get hot until a few weeks ago and the part of the house that never cools is the guest area.
So, after being here a few weeks and having a guest stay and tell me how hot it is, I call to ask Island Air to see what is the problem, since they were the ones who said it worked great.
Well, of course, they won't come out and inspect without paying Another fee!😡
Needless to say, don't trust their word because evidently it is no good. Now I have an ac unit that does not work properly, after they told me it did. And, I have to pay someone to fix it!!😡😡😡
Great Company there, NOT!

name: Leigh Scott
text:
We are building a new house. Our building contractor recommended Island Air-Air Conditioning and Heating, Gulf Shores, AL. My husband and I previously lived in several homes with HVAC problems stemming from poor design and installations. We knew we wanted to avoid those with new construction.

I initially met with Rob Barnas of Island Air to explain our HVAC desires. Rob and Chris designed a plan to address the "wants & needs" of our system. It's very easy to install flexible ducts improperly, but Eddie and the men ran the ducts and attached the air handlers with great care.

New HVAC systems are very expensive. I did not want to buy a new system and suffer the same issues that we had to pay to have repaired in previous houses. So, throughout the construction process I asked dozens of questions.  I'm sure this was tiresome for Island Air, but they were very patient with me. Honestly, how can anyone be expected to properly operate and care for a system unless they understand how it's supposed to work? Hahahaha. Also, I wanted to understand the system while I could still see the components. Our drywall is not up yet. We are now 4 months into construction, so not far enough along to have thermostats installed or have the system turned on. However, we are enough along for me to say I am happy this far with the work done by Island Air of Gulf Shores, AL. I will try to post again after we move in to give everyone a final report on how it feels to live in an HVAC system built by Island Air.

PS. In case you are wondering. I am not related by blood or personal connections to anyone at Island Air and have received no discounts or other incentives for posting this review.
D. Scott
Gulf Shores, AL

name: Nautical Star
text: My first experience with this company was in 2014 when I asked them to install an AC system to my downstairs add on.  The initial job was well done.  I was happy with the work that I entered a service agreement for my upstairs unit. In 2016 my trust with the company was severely damaged when the AC tech charged me for the part that was still under warranty and I had to call them on it.  To the company credit, they did "refund" me with the credit on the next repair job in the spring of 2017.  I paid the invoice without examining it carefully as I should have done.  Two months in late May of 2017, I received a letter from the Baldwin County small claim court saying that Island  Air is suing me for nonpayment.  I called them and the manager told me that all this can go away if I pay them at that point.  I went home and dug up all my paperwork and found out that they overcharged me once again on the visit in spring 2017.  I faxed them my receipts and called them the next day and advised them not to go ahead with the lawsuit because they will not win in court.  They rescinded the the court claim and offered me a six month maintenance complimentary service for my inconvenience,  but after all the shenanigans I have to walk away.  The trust factor is no longer there.  I waited for four months to write this review to make sure that my emotion is in check and to give them a fair review about my experience with the company.   Take home points?  Save your receipts and you need to know about the warranty your AC system.  Always go check the charges line by line and make sure to keep this company honest.  They will take advantage of your ignorance.

name: Lori Hulbert (Tour Texas Hill Country)
text: I live in Dallas, TX and due to the storm that came through there are no water heaters in Dallas at this time.  I googled the store and spoke with Chris to see if there was any way they could use my FEDEX number and ship me a unit.  I know this is an unusual request, and he walked me through the process, explaining what would need to be done in order to make that happen.  He was professional, friendly and efficient, and they even drove my until to the shipping location so I didn't have to request a driver pick up.  We've been through such an ordeal here and Chris defiantly made me life easier!  A GREAT BIG TEXAS SIZED THANK YOU!

resp.text: Thank you, Lori! We are so glad we could help and we hope you guys are recovering after the storms! We will pass along your kind words to Chris. Thank you for your business and thank you for believing in Southern Pipe!

name: andy rajek
text: Had to have inside unit replaced a couple weeks ago through home warranty with Old Republic. Both companies were great, but Anchor Air went above and beyond. Today, my grandkids came over and the a/c quit working.  Jason, the on call service tech, came out at 10:00. On a Friday night.....after trying to help me figure it out over several phone calls. Great people and company.

name: James Davis
text: After a long move from California,  our new Alabama home needed two HVAC systems replaced.  My wife and I shopped around with several companies and decided on Anchor Air.  That has been one of the best decisions we've made since arriving here in Gulf Shores.  The service we received and installation was outstanding.  The entire team was very professional, on time and went the absolute extra mile to make sure we were taken care of.  If you are searching for a solid company to install and take care of your HVAC needs, stop searching and just call them up.   I can't say enough good things about them...but I will sum it up to say they are Truly exceptional!  Thanks you guys...

name: Ginger Harrison
text: Steven was great!  Very professional,  explained everything to me and did a great job!  Thank you so much!  I really appreciate you coming to fix my air in the evening hours!  I was sent a text when he was on his way along with his picture.   I felt very safe using them.  I would recommend this business and I will use them again!

name: Michael Nassar
text: One of the biggest decisions I've had to make in quite some time was to purchase a new heating and air conditioning system. I chose Anchor Air here in Foley, and I'm so glad I did. I would like to thank the entire Anchor Air team for their exceptional service. I would like to thank Bob, the owner, for his great care and generosity. Bob truly went the extra mile to make me happy and to make everything just right. I would also like to thank Jason for always being so good-natured, patient and happy to answer all of my questions. Robert was also very helpful. Jason, Robert, Andy and their entire team did everything with great skill and precision. This is a hardworking group of people, and they are all polite and professional. Thanks also to Michelle and Brook for cheerfully arranging each appointment. I recommend Anchor Air most highly.

name: Windy Holder
text: Recently bought a brand new unit from Anchor Air and had it installed by Jason and Steve. These two guys are the best. If you are looking for an AC company I highly recommend Anchor Air! From the young lady answering the phone(I think her name is Brook) to the guys installing everyone is just so nice:)

name: Ruby Tomlinson
text: We are very happy with Anchor Air’s service, and continue to praise Steven Bowman, he is very much appreciated.

resp.text: We are here to help anytime, day, night, and weekends. Thank you for allowing us to serve you and thank you for this great rating!
