text: Anchor Air did an outstanding job maintaining my old AC and then installing a new one. Their technicians were professional, friendly, courteous, and thorough. I would definitely recommend Anchor Air to anyone!

resp.text: We hope you felt like we took time to inform you of the work needed and why. Thank you for allowing Anchor Air to help your with repairs, maintenance, or installation of your heating and air conditioning equipment.

name: Bmw 325m
text: I will recomand Jason super quick  and profesional

name: Nancy Johnson
text: Can’t thank Anchor Air enough for coming out on a holiday and after dark to fix our air. Would highly recommend this company to anyone.

name: Ronald Benoit
text: We had an issue on a Friday with our HVAC and didn't call Anchor until around 2 pm. They dispatched a technician within 2 hours and took care of our problem quickly.

name: Barbara Collinsworth
text: From the owner to the front desk people they were super professional and understanding.

name: Kathy Boone
text: My technician was timely, pleasant and competent, and the people in the office are pleasant and helpful.

name: Steve Tuttle
text: Wow.  I called late in the evening when my air went out.  Jason answered and walked me thru a possible fix.  I didn't have all the tools at my disposal but what he walked me thru was enough for us to stay cool thru the night.  I scheduled a service call for the next day and he arrived on time.  He was very polite, professional, walked me thru everything he did, and gave maintenance suggestions to help avoid my issue in the future.  This type of business model has been lost by most businesses.  Upfront, Honest, Helpful.  An outstanding concept of informing the customer of options and help without trying to gouge the customer for every dime.  Based on this model, you can bet they will be the first company I call when I need a replacement or any service.   Based on my experience, Don't hesitate to call these guys.

name: mark tisch
text:
Great service, very prompt, good prices, and the best communication of any company in the country!
We have used them to put in 2 total hvac units in the last 4 months and they will be the one we call from now on!

name: Troy Cook
text: The technician was very friendly and professional.  The only down side was that he did not have any kind of mask to wear.  Any service provider should anticipate the need to wear a mask when serving high risk customers.  This would have easily been a five start review, if he had a mask to wear.  I wore a N95 mask during his service call.  The risk of transmission would have been lower if we both had worn masks.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Troy! Our number one objective is our customers comfort and safety so thank you for bringing this to my attention. We provide all our technicians with masks and I can assure you they will be wearing one for you at our next visit. Merry Christmas!!

name: Pam Scoggins
text:
Anchor Air responded quickly and professionally when I was in need. They had installed a new air conditioning unit, but the unit malfunctioned. Anchor was quick to acknowledge the issue and to replace the unit, rather than just offering a fix for the unit. Now I have a new unit with a full warranty! I’m very pleased!
Thank you, Anchor Air.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review!

name: Lisa Marie Atchley
text: Anchor was incredible. I started off having to work with them through the warranty company and didn’t have a choice since they were picked. Once the warranty company did NOT come through I could go with anyone I wanted and got a buy out. I chose to stay with Anchor because of Julie and her customer service as well as the owner helping to speed up the process and give me a very fair price. The staff that came out to install were so professional, clean, efficient and just overall a pleasure. We had asked around about their reputation and others said they were good and the lived up to it. Thanks to everyone at Anchor for making a bad warranty experience a great one for us.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Lisa! It was great working with you and I’m glad we met or exceeded your expectations.

text: Overall I had a very good experience. I would definitely recommend them to friends/family in the future. They came out on a Sunday to repair our unit that had stopped blowing cool air. The only suggestion I would have is the number that’s listed to call, maybe make it more clear what times there will be someone available to take a call after hours. The website says the business is open “24 hours” which I imagine that’s because they take emergency calls. But, I had to call that number about 5 times within a couple hours to get someone on the phone. But, once I did it was a very pleasant experience they took care of my request immediately and very friendly. I work in a customer service roll, so that’s very important as you’re very much the face or the voice of the company.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Ms. DeJarnett! We appreciate the feedback! Please always leave a message and someone will call you back if they’re not available to answer. We always check messages if there’s a time we aren’t able to answer. Thanks again for your business!

name: Mike Austell
text:
We had a great experience with Carden Heating & Cooling!
We have always had a large Birmingham company service our unit and we weren't very impressed with their service group. So when it came time to get a new unit we started looking around. We had 6 different companies come quote our new system (large and small companies). We didn't stop our research there. Whenever possible I went and looked at a system each of those companies had installed to get an idea of the quality of their installers. I had never heard of Carden before,  but they came very highly recommend and after seeing their quality work and receiving the quote I understood why. We considered several of the quotes, but Carden offered a far superior unit at a better price than other quoted for a cheaper unit. They came and installed the unit the next business day and they did a phenomenal job. Kyle quoted our system and he was here for the install to make sure everything was taken care of just as we discussed. I can't say enough about the great job everyone at Carden did to take care of us. Carden will be the only company touching our system from now on.

resp.text: We are glad you found us Mike! Thanks for choosing Carden!

name: Carolyn Seay
text:
Carden Heating and Cooling 😁😁😁.
I was having problems with my ac. It was Saturday morning around 6:00am. I sent an email and a voicemail. By 7:00am. I received a call from Amanda. Who was very sweet and very professional. She told me she would have someone out asap.

Simon arrived at 8:00am. He was very nice and introduced himself. He gave me instructions on what I needed  to do. I came outside and he had already diagnosed the problem. He told me that he had the part with him on site. He fixed it and he gave me detailed information about what to expect and the warranty time frame.

It was great quality work and service and reasonable price for an after hours service call. Will definitely use them for my maintenance.

Thank you again Carden Heating and Cooling!!!!

Carolyn S.

text: We called them out for some maintenance on our AC ac and to repair some things..... our technician was very nice and respectful with dealing with more problems then we thought we had... however he arrived two hours late, didn’t have all the materials he needed to complete the job and had to come back a second day. The main complaint however is that we called them out with the specific request of cleaning our fins on the second day... when we asked about the fins being cleaned they said it would be too difficult and did not complete this request.... I will say we didn’t push this as we were wary of their ability to it if it was “to hard” but if it was easy I would have done it myself in the first place... what they did was good overall but it was a lot of work for us to have it done and that is not what I like to pay for.

resp.text: Ashley - I'm sorry that we fell short of your expectations.  We work really hard to provide 5 star service. Please call our office at 205-669-2459 and ask to speak to Simon.  We will do whatever it takes to make it right. Thanks - Simon

text: I've been with Carden HVAC since 2015, and I must say, I am very satisfied and pleased with the service they have rendered thus far. Carden is found to be a very friendly and family-oriented business.

name: Ramona Rhodes
text:
I have used Carden Heating & Cooling for about 7 years and could not be more pleased. Simon and Amanda Carden do a great job making sure their customers receive superior service. Their technicians are knowledgeable, professional, and communicative. If you are interested in finding a this company that is honest, reliable, and reasonable, call Carden. Whether you need a new unit, repair of an aging unit, or a quality maintenance plan, they will take care of you. When I bought a new home just last week, I scheduled Carden on the day of closing to check out my system and begin a maintenance plan. I trust them and am so glad I found them!

Ramona Rhodes
Mt. Laurel in Birmingham, AL

resp.text: We really appreciate your business Ramona! Thanks for the review!

text: Service technicians were pleasant, efficient and nice to deal with.

Everyone I dealt with was professional and personable. As far as we are concerned, you’ve got a new customer for life! Thanks so much for helping us out!

name: Diana Statum
text:
Starting with office staff, Amanda was extremely kind on the phone, responsive to my needs and easy to work with.
Punctuality, the service man  a arrived exactly as promised and they called (as promised) to update on travel and arrival.
Service, the problem was diagnosed without question and was accurate. The parts were acquired within minimal Time and then installed immediately. Problem resolved, unit up and running. No mess left.
Service man, was extremely personable and professional. No bad language, no disrespect of person nor property (Especially since I had no idea what parts were even called nor their job). Showed me the problem the broken part and explained kindly how it affected the working (or lack there of) of the unit.  He even showed as much surprise as me to find a dead bluebird lodged in the motor! Only I can have a 500.00 bird Malfunction! Lol. Anyway, all considered, the cost of the part was the only stressful experience.  😊

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your business Diana! Thank you for taking the time to give us a review and such positive feedback.

text: Carden Heating and Cooling did a fantastic job installing our new AC system. They arrived at the time they said they would, and ensured that my system was functional before leaving. I would highly recommend them to anyone that needs HVAC assistance. I now see why they were such highly rated.

The tech (Kyle) was on time and even called to let me know he was on his way.  He was polite, efficient, certainly very knowledgeable and quickly completed the repairs.  He answered a lot of questions I had on the heat pump and made recommendations for future maintains.
I could not be happier.  I will be calling Carden for summer service and for all repairs and replacements with my HVAC.  So refreshing to get good service,  no, excellent service.  I highly recommends these folks.
Jonathan

text: We used Cardens to replace a 13 year old unit that had gone out. The technician was very professional and explained what was going on and gave us options. It’s hard to find honest HVAC companies and I have dealt with some that weren’t but I feel that Cardens is very honest and dependable. I highly recommend them and will use them again in the future.

name: Avery Rhodes Akins
text:
I am a loyal Carden customer...I should probably get a t-shirt!!!  The Carden team services my two homes as well as the homes of the clients who rent homes from me.  The communications team is always kind, helpful, knowledgeable, and organized when I need to schedule a Carden visit.  The ground team is friendly, knowledgeable, and offers very high quality workmanship for very fair prices.  The entire team is great at explaining technical issues that are often beyond what I know and understand about HVAC systems!

Carden has been able to capably fix every heating and cooling issue that I or one of my rental clients has ever had.  One particular issue was pretty involved and complex in an older home this past summer, where, due to a prior installer doing shoddy work, my client was unable to cool her home and was receiving sky-high bills.  The Carden Team came in and fixed the entire system and duct work, and her bill has gone down by HUNDREDS of dollars!!

One final note, and this may make me favorite thing about the Carden family:  I work with a vulnerable, low-income community, and it is often difficult to hire service workers to come into the communities where we need things fixed.  I have actually had service workers tell me directly that they would not service one of my clients’ homes due to their address.  It is heartbreaking.  Carden has never made my clients or me feel like they were not good enough.  They come, with a smile on their faces, prepared to do good work every time for every person.  That’s good business and good leadership.  Thank you Carden...you’ve got me forever in your corner!!

resp.text: It’s customers like you that keep our business growing. We are thankful to have your family as customers and friends!

name: Michael Blackwood
text:
They came and performed warranty repairs to our a/c compressor, fixed in lightning speed. We had been waiting two weeks for the company that installed the new HVAC in our home (Buckner plumbing and heating) to come service the unit and after six calls to them in which they promised to be coming that day and then had an excuse each and every time why they weren't coming. They went so far as to tell us they don't money in warranty repairs, even when we had an extended warranty for 13 years. They told me to call someone else to come and do the repairs. The catch in all this was that our extended warranty covered both parts and labor. If we had to go to a different Trane dealer they would not cover the labor costs, but the parts were at no charge. I read several good reviews about Carden and decided to go with them. Our repairman was by far one of the most professional, kind and courteous people we have ever had the pleasure of working with. They gave us an estimate before hand and I had already checked the average labor costs to change the compressor out and their rate was very reasonable. Upon finishing the job and it came time to settle up with and to my amazement they came over five hundred dollars cheaper than the original estimate. HVAC has been running around the clock to keep our house at 62 degrees around the clock. I can't tolerate heat due to a medical condition. They called us a few days later to just in in to make sure it's still running great.

It's now over a month since they fixed and I got an email just to check on us, which I truly appreciated. It's is running all the time to keep the house in an arctic deep freeze.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your business!

name: Debbie Glasgow
text: I would not trust anyone else the way I trust Carden. They are prompt and HONEST!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Debbie. We appreciate you!

name: Ms. Brittany
text: They were nice, professional, and arrived on time. This is why they earned two stars. However, I hired them to do winter maintenance and to tell me what was wrong with my units. I was talked into buying a starter kit for over 250 bucks which I later found out typically cost significantly less. This was for my upstairs unit which did not work. I ended up spending 3 times more than what I wanted to and my units still didn’t perform well. I was also told that I would be contacted with warranty information on my units which never happened. I understand that businesses have to make a profit but I still can’t help but feel taken advantage of.

resp.text:
Hi Ms. Brittany,
I'm sorry to hear that you feel like you've been taken advantage of.  We pride ourselves on being upfront and honest in every circumstance.  I've made it a point to put my customers best interest before my own for over 20 years.  Please call our office at 669-2459 and ask for Simon.  I'd be glad to go over your invoice and answer any questions you have.
Thanks!
Simon Carden, Owner

It's no wonder Google trusts them so much because I feel the same way and can't sing their praises enough. Kevin was a pro with over 30 years of experience in HVAC. I truly felt like he wouldn't lead us in a wrong direction. We ended up needing to replace our unit, but I felt like the quote was a very fair. Installation could not go any smoother either.

All that to say, if you want fast, honest, fair pricing on HVAC work - call Carden today.

From the front office to the service technicians/installers to the owners, if you are looking for a company with integrity, pricing  and service, choose Carden HVAC.

text: The team at affordable heating and cooling did an amazing job replacing my A/C unit. text: All I can say is WOW! I called when my ac unit went out and they came that day! Other company’s couldn’t get out for a week just to look at my unit. Scott came out and priced my new unit and got me set up for repairs right away!  His team showed up at 8am and worked all day to get my house up and running. They have the best prices and there customer service is amazing! If your looking don’t waste your time with other company’s this is the one you need to use! There customer service is amazing there prices are amazing!! They go above and beyond!  Call them today!!!!

name: Ben Collins Art
text: Friendly same day service at a reasonable price.

name: Matthew Ashley
text: I've been using Scott with Affordable Heating and Cooling for years now. I use him to maintain my HVAC equipment at home and work. They have always been reliable and gotten us fixed up fast if ever an issue comes up. Recently my wife and I had them install the new Sensi Predict monitoring system on our unit at home. This unit was installed in a timely manner. The Sensi Predict allows myself and Affordable Heating and Cooling to monitor various items on my equipment. If anything gets out of line it will alert myself and Affordable Heating and Cooling that something isn't right with the unit. This will help keep small issues that are normally not seen until they cause bigger issues to be taken care of and extend the life of my older (14 year old) HVAC unit. I always recommend Affordable Heating and Cooling to anyone asking for service and support. Thanks again to Scott and his crew.

resp.text: Matt I'm glad you are enjoying the Sensi Predict and the 24/7 monitoring of your air conditioning system.  Thank you for being a long time friend of the Affordable Heating and Cooling team.

name: Kim Andrews
text: We have used Affordable Heating & Air for years now.  They are always professional, honest, hard working, & dependable.  I never feel pressured to purchase or buy anything that is not necessary or extra.  Scott is thoughtful and goes out of his way to explain the issue which builds trust and respect.  I never question whether I am receiving the BEST care for my A/C units.  We highly recommend Scott & will only use Affordable Heating & Air!

name: M
text: My HVAC system started leaking so I called another contractor who simply told me it was improperly installed and needed to be reinstalled. I wanted a second opinion so I called Affordable Heating and Air. The dispatcher was professional and informed me someone would be calling me. Within 5 minutes Scott called me back and scheduled to come to my home. He was able to give me a temporary fix until I can rectify the true issue. So far I’ve experienced nothing but professionalism from them!

text: Scott arrived the same morning to address the problem. He was very thorough and explained in detail every step of the process. Scott is very professional, polite, and very well qualified to handle all problems. He explained the maintenance plans, and I am happy to say we are on one of the affordable plans. I would highly recommend the company to anyone in the area because the prices are fair, and the customer service is outstanding. Thank you all so much!

name: Phillip Bowden
text: AH&C we're terrific!! Did exactly what they said they would do when they said they would do it. The staff was professional and I hardly knew they were in the house.

name: Casey Vinson
text: Called these folks the morning after my heat went out in the middle of the night. Explained that I have a disabled child in my home and needed someone to come out and get us up and running. The lady seemed really nice and symapathetic. After taking my name, number, address and email, she assured me someone would call me back in “just a little while” to schedule a time to come out. Never heard back from them at all. I understand if they were unable to help me out. My issue is the lack of communication. I placed several calls to several other companies. All of which at least tried to or told me if they could not help. Affordable Heating & Cooling is the only company that never bothered to call me back. Hats off to D ’n A Heating & Air for going out of their way to help us.

resp.text: We apologize that we missed your call Casey Vinson. Our staff has been working around the clock, so your call was directed to our answering service. We are sorry your call fell through the cracks. Looking over the notes from our answering service we have no recorded mention of a disability call, we try to prioritize no heat calls depending on the severity starting with young children and the elderly. As a company we aim to return calls to all our clients even if we cannot handle their issue to at least direct them to another solution. Once again we are sorry for not being able to return your call during this hectic time and are happy that you were able to solve your issue. Please accept a free maintenance check up on us.  If you would like text me(Scott) personally.  706-332-9880.

name: Brandy Kreisler
text: Scott did a great job.  He was very knowledgeable and dependable.  Our a/c was out on Friday night, but Scott came by and worked on the a/c until it worked.  That is excellent service!!

name: Jay Mac
text: Scott, was a great help very professional and knowledgeable. He takes great pride in his work. Thanks to him, my family has me freezing again.

Everything works well and we have saved money on our power bills since the installation.  I highly recommend Scott Copeland and Affordable Heating and Cooling  for any of your heating and cooling needs.

text: They fit me in on what was already a busy day (the Friday before a holiday). Great customer service and very knowledgable. Answered all my questions and made recommendations. Hopefully my furnace keeps working throughout winter but, if it doesn’t, I will be a returning customer.

text: Excellent work and customer service! They got my house nice and cool again and I am so thankful! Definitely recommend Affordable Heating and Cooling!!

name: David Holt
text:
I have two 15 year old Trane heat pumps in my home. I am planning to completely renovate both systems in the next 12 months because I know that equipment like this only lasts 12 to 15 years, even when you keep it professionally maintained like we do.

Unfortunately, one of the compressors died and it makes no sense to repair it but I am not quite ready to invest in the new equipment just yet. I called Affordable and was told they could install a temporary cooling system to get us through the next few weeks while we get our renovation plans and money together.

In less than 4 hours, the Affordable team had the temporary cooling unit up and running! The house is already 3 degrees cooler and feeling great!

I really like that these guys look out for your safety, health, comfort, and lifetime efficiency.

Affordable for life!

resp.text: Thank you for the compliment of our service, Mr. Rospert, we strive to make sure any job we do is done well. Sorry for the trouble with getting a hold of us, but we have no messages on record, even with our answering service. We are not doubting that you tried to get in contact with us, just that it seems something caused all attempts to fail. I'm glad we were able to talk since this review and I hope the service we provided was to your satisfaction.

resp.text: Thank you Doug, I have a wonderful staff and we love our customers.

name: Fuck Your God
text: As a plumber they don't have a lot of stuff I need alot of times. But good people I don't know about anything else.

text: A very beautiful, clean showroom with everything you need to decorate your home. Corey was very helpful, and ordered just the right ceiling fan for our porch.

resp.text: Thank you Julie, and I'll let Corey know how you appreciated his assistance.

name: Olivia Hardy
text: My husband went to the back to buy a blower unit for the inside part of our A/C. When he got there he found out that they don't sell them as a unit like they used to. You have to buy just the motor, so that's what he bought. When he gets it home, he finds out that it didn't have mount brackets so I went up there to get one that does. I was then told that none of the motors come with bracket mounts. I made the comment that he should have told my husband that so he could have gotten it while he was there. It's hot and this is our A/C unit we're trying to fix in the middle of a hot day. The gentleman said it wasn't his job to know what a person knew or not. I told him that he knew more than my husband on what parts come with what, that's when a woman came around counter and said that she was the owner and that I didn't need to talk to her employee that way. I wasn't being rude or belligerent. I just didn't think it would have been that hard to ask if the customer knew it didn't come with bracket mounts, especially if he brought an older model in. This will be the last time my family and I will be back to that store and before today, I would have recommended that store to anyone. Now I'll tell people to stay away. It's nothing like it used to be.

resp.text:
Mrs. Hardy,
You did not speak to the owner for I am the owner, and I was at another store that day, you spoke to a co-worker, but Mrs. Hardy we have no idea what a customer's needs are until they inform us.
There are hundreds of units, and they change models every year, and the servicemen have to request what they need from us. We are a supply house, not a service company, and we are sorry that your husband did not realize he need additional products, but that was his call and not ours. Your husband was servicing his own unit.
We try and make all customers happy, and were sorry that you were disappointed, but do realize we have no idea what is wrong with a central unit until a serviceman request a particular part.

name: AK _SAVAGE
text: The ladies who work in the front are very friendly and helpful, as well as the associates that are in the showrooms. Huge variety of lighting, many are on display for the customer to see. There's something for everyone!

name: Jason King
text: When I purchased my house 10 years ago the unit was already installed by absolute air. I did my research and called them for a service on the unit. Now that the unit is getting older I'm trying to milk every year I can out of it. The house was not cooling so I called them and they came out today ...unit is in good shape. They cleaned the coils and checked everything out. Come to find out one of the branch ducts had come aloose and cool air was going under the house ....this was fixed and it's getting cooler now as I type. We keep the house cold like 65 degrees during the hot summer months. We work outside and it's always nice to come home to a cool house. Thanks to the tech that came out he was awesome.

name: Tammy Mcclure
text: Absolute Air is always on time and does a great job!  They have fixed my AC’s in several locations and even installed new ones.  They have also installed a ductless unit in my house and a hot water heater.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Tammy, thanks for the kind words.  We love to help our customers.

name: Sandra Moon
text: I have used Chris and his team for years. His customer service is awesome!  This means quick service, reliable and professional. This is what you are looking for when you have a problem and it is 80 degrees outside! Happy customer!

name: Ashley Drum
text: I called early this morning and had Chris out by the afternoon! He repaired our unit in a matter of minutes and was kind and courteous throughout the whole process. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank You Ashley

name: Anne Riley
text: This is my second great experience with this company! The first time around, I asked them to give me a second opinion after being told I needed a whole new system by someone else. They told me I did not need a new system, and made a repair that cost maybe $100 instead of the thousands I would have spent otherwise. This time, one of their techs, Noah, was able to solve a strange problem I was having with my thermostat not reading correctly even though it was functioning fine, and the system was functioning fine—something no one else has been able to solve. (Let's just say it was actually an insulation issue, not an HVAC issue. But he still fixed it.) I'm thankful for their trustworthiness because that can be hard to find. Would absolutely recommend them to everyone I know.

resp.text: Anne, we are so glad we could help you out

name: Stephanie Reese
text: Noah and Caleb are very knowledgeable about mini-split systems and were able to repair my system ASAP. Very punctual and professional. Highly recommend Absolute Air!

text: The hot weather hit our units and we called Absolute Air because they have always treated us great.

resp.text: Thanks Stephen

text:
Highly recommend!
Absolute Air came out, identified the issue and fixed our AC same day. Very knowledgeable and courteous.

name: ronnie chappell
text: Great job and we're very pleased.....

name: ralph doughton
text: Rapid response, knowledgeable technician, fair price.

name: karyn stalcup
text: Our 14 year old Trane AC died a week ago. After getting a quote from a well known 5⭐️ company in Birmingham, I had sticker shock at the replacement cost for a unit that was not near the quality of a Trane and a downgrade compared to my current specs. A friend recommended Chris Kelley at Absolute Air. What a lifesaver. He arrived within two hours after my call. He quoted me an American Standard (maker of Trane) that significantly upgraded my current seer rating and added a variable speed versus single stage unit. His price cremated the previous company’s quote with a superior product and upgrade. Unit was installed less than 48 hours later. Excellent service techs that were polite and so helpful. I don’t think I have ever been so impressed with an HVAC company. Thank you Chris.

name: Martha Williams
text: Great company to work with.  It was pouring rain but they still came when we needed them

name: James Green
text: Great company and very responsive

name: Bekah Vakil
text: They were absolutely the best company I have ever dealt with. Quick response, worked with me on billing, and very nice and professional.

name: MARILYN WHITLOCK
text: I have used this company since it started years ago.

name: Ben Watson
text: My ac unit started acting up over the weekend so I called Absolute Air Monday morning and they promptly sent out Mike, to inspect my system. He tried to repair the unit but it was 15yrs old and needing to be replaced. They quickly gave me an estimate for a replacement with great finance options. I chose to go the the Trane system and the next day Curtis and John Mark showed up to install. The entire staff was very friendly, courteous and respectful. I would highly recommend Absolute Air.

name: LaRita Smith
text: My experience with Absolute Air Inc. was FANTASTIC!!!! The level of professionalism, knowledge of hvac systems, being patient and friendly, and answering all questions I had made my experience with them wonderful. The team that put my system in was GREAT!!!! They got the job done efficiently and explained to me the process. That means a lot as a customer and I recommend anyone needing HVAC services to call ABSOLUTE AIR INC. The guys are great and the staff in the office is friendly and accommodating.

name: Tammie Day
text:
I was blessed to be referred to
Mr. Rich.  After my AC  stopped in the middle of a heat wave. He is very knowledgeable, professional,  and  able to get all repairs done in a timely manner. When your AC is out call on Absolute Air for all your repairs.

name: Shelia Morris
text: Excellent service!!!  I would recommend this company to anyone who wants quality work at fair prices.

name: Gilbert Nicholson
text:
Johnny Rich is a great guy - one of the nicest fellows you'll run across in the HVAC community in Birmingham. But he's not reliable.

He had already been to my house on a couple of calls over the last couple of years, and did a great job. Back in October, I left him a voice mail on his cell phone to check my HVAC unit. No reply.

A few days later I texted him, and got a return text he would get back to me later. I never heard from him.

His voice mail says call his office for immediate help. I then left a message with a woman who answered the phone, who i assume was his secretary. She said she would pass the message on to him and he would call to set up an appointment. I never heard from him. In my book, three strikes and you're out.

I have no idea why he didn't want the business. But even if I had been a new customer, if he didn't want the business, or was too busy and didn't have time, you would think he would have the professional courtesy to call and say he was too busy. Or call back and say something.

I called Norrell, who was recommended by some friends. They responded immediately and fixed the problem at a reasonable rate. I won't be calling Absolute Air again.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Excellent service and on time.

name: Lee held
text: They are Aces!

name: Ci B
text:
Called and came out the same day.
Reasonable prices .  Would recommend

name: Mary George
text: Great workers

name: Marie Sweat
text: I called at 9:30 this morning to make an appointment and the tech was at my house by 10:30. The tech was professional and courteous and quickly solved the issue. He explained what he did and why and was done in less than 2 hours. The price was also reasonable. Overall, a great experience and will use them again!

name: Mary McKinnon
text:
The entire staff has been helpful and professional! Thank you Gary, Carla and Katie for your information and guidance. Gary went out of his way to accommodate our crazy schedule. He is so knowledgeable.
Mason, Jaq and Clay arrived on time, they were professional and informative. The work was done in a timely manner, very neat and clean with attention to detail. When they were done, there was not a spec of anything left. Thank you for a job so well done!

name: Katie Willis
text: I have been using Total Comfort for about 3 years. They have always exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend this company for your heating and air needs.

name: M Tyree Wilson
text: From the initial PHONE CALL TO THE FINAL "FIST BUMP" AFTER THE INSTALL....We knew we made the right decision going with this company...The rep we set up the appointment with....EXCELLENT...The guy(Gary) that came out to do the estimate....EXCELLENT and HONEST ....The guys who performed the Install....you guessed it EXCELLENT !!!!!!  My family and I are very pleased with everything that was presented and performed....couldn't  ask for better service...Total Comfort Heating and Air is the TOTAL PACKAGE of Honesty, Service, and Professionalism ....

name: C Mallory
text: This was my first time using this company, but it definitely will not be my last. I called on a Saturday when my furnace went out, which was actually beyond repair and had to be replaced. They were very polite and courteous and I am well pleased with my new furnace.

name: kristy templeton
text: Great place. Harry is the best

name: Sylvia N.
text: Total Comfort Heating and Air is an excellent company, fully committed in delivering the absolute best service to its customer base.  The HVAC technicians are highly knowledgeable and very professional.  They  efficiently get your home back to the right temperature at a reasonable cost.  Chelsea, in the office, schedules appointments with the lowest wait time.  Harry, the service manager, is responsive to individual customer's needs and intends to exceed their expectations.  Big hearts all around with these people!  I wish other companies were this sincere in pleasing the public.

name: Ambera Law
text:
Total Comfort Heating & Air, they came out Saturday my system had frozen-up, water was leaking into the room below. .I was told me what to do over the week-end, they said they would return on Monday.
They came that Monday morning and did everything they said I needed and extra work to get my system up and working in a timely manner.  Total Comfort Heatimg & Air is a great company.  They stand on you word Thank God for a company like theirs.

name: Mrs Johnson
text: I have to say that the one person I spoke with was very polite and professional. I called their office and Mrs. Danielle pick up with a very polite and professional voice. I have several questions and she didn’t hesitate to answer any of them. I could tell she was very busy as she did have to ask me to be put on hold a few times,( which wasn’t a problem)  but each time she came back she would always apologize and make sure she helped me in any way she could. With everything going on in our world this is someone you would enjoy talking too. This to me is how you would want your fore front of your business to be. I will have no problem recommending this company or recommending Danielle to anyone.

name: Taylor Stinson
text: Landon and Justin who did our install were awesome. Really professional and knowledgeable about what they were doing. Cleaned up their area after finishing.

name: Kekke Young
text: Brett was our technician. He was very knowledgeable and efficient. He answered all of our questions.

name: Kamren P
text: I would definitely recommend this company . I called on Sat morning around 5am & someone was able to come out around 9am I only had to pay $50 for them to come out , which was awesome considering that it's the weekend . Some other companies charge a much higher fee to come out on a Sat . My technician was Tyler . He was excellent! As a woman , he made me feel very comfortable. He explained the situation clearly and informed me of my options . I didn't feel pressured , swindled , or hustled like I have by a technician from another company . He was very honest . I will definitely call them in the future .

name: Alphonso Hicks
text: My system was installed in 2014 by TC. I wasn’t impressed with the old owners, and the way they did business. The new owners are great and the Technicians are so much better than what we’ve seen in the past. Eddie did the maintenance recently and did a great job. Found some issues from the initial install and took care of them at no cost to us. Really appreciate the new owners and staff.

name: Helen Nuelle
text: My air conditioning was not functioning and the company came in checked it out  and made recommendations to correct the problem. Our new system is efficient and it was installed quickly.

name: Earl Cambron
text: Great experience working with Fisher. Would highly recommend Fisher and Total Comfort!

name: Jackie Jones
text: Thank heavens Total Comfort Hearing & Air is under new ownership! In June 2017 we replaced our old units with two American Standard ac & heating units under the previous owner and the installers were awful.  We had small gas leaks on both units, insulation around the refrigerant lines was half ass done on the downstairs unit and not even replaced on the upstairs which was dried & cracking, etc.  When I called to have the has gas smell checked out the new owners were eager to get someone sent out immediately. The smell was intermittent so I wasn't sure if there was an issue. The first time Sonny came out & took care of the downstairs gas smell.  A few hours after he left the air purifier wasn't working.  Eddie came to our house and fixed and also noticed the "dryer" was installed backwards on the both units. He corrected both problems in addition to gas smell upstairs, & addressed the insulation on the refrigerant lines.  Eddie was wonderful! We so appreciate the time he has spent to address the install issues. My husband owns a construction company and we've dealt with several HVAC companies for our home & business....hands down we are so impressed with the service Total Comfort provides.  The ladies in the office are the first impression of the company and they are awesome! Total Comfort will continue to receive our business due to the great service & and friendly demeanor of their employees!

name: Ethan Jones
text: Eddie came out to my parents place yesterday. I really appreciate the time he took taking care of their needs and he was very polite and professional. We had some less than happy experiences with this company before the new owners took over, but it looks like they have really turned things around for the better.

name: Scott Williams
text: Total Comfort came out this afternoon.  The technician was Harry. He was very polite and informative. We are getting a new furnace installed on Monday. I would highly recommend Total Comfort to anyone. Thank you so much!! Scott Williams

name: Anne Vicknair
text: After the last service my AC unit wasn’t cooling properly. Called TotalComfort and Eddie came out on a weekend and found the problem and easily corrected it at no charge. Not many companies will stand behind their work like that anymore. Really appreciate the kind and prompt service.

name: Sandra Reaves
text: Gary was very prompt, professional, and efficient.  We really appreciated his courtesy. He quickly got our air conditioner up and running.  In this hot weather, that makes him a super hero to us!!  Thank you so very much!

name: Jason Lane Garrison
text: If you’re looking for a company that’s reliable, professional and do honest work look no more.  I heard Total Comfort Heating was under new management so I was reluctant to call them but did they change my mind when I used them.  Quick to respond, professional and spent the time explaining what was going on with my unit. I’ll definitely use them again.

name: Danny Brown
text: My a/c was not operating correctly so I placed a call to One Source Heating and Cooling and asked for a service man to visit and find the problem.The ladies in the office were very nice and professional and arranged for him to come and access the situation. Sonny   ( the serviceman) arrived right on time and quickly found the problem and had me going in about 10 minutes. He was very professional as well and I certainly will be calling them again for all of my heating and cooling needs. They are the best company for their honesty, punctuality, dependability, professionalism and affordability. I'm so grateful to have them.

name: John Casada
text:
We have two HVAC systems. Total Comfort replaced our first system two years ago. Our second started acting up and we called Total Comfort again.
Harry was quick to come out, located the problems with our system and patiently explained what was wrong. He then discussed all of our options for repairing vs replacing. Unfortunately, we had to replace our 26 year old Trane system. Harry really helped us with this bad news and discussed financing options.  I hate that we have to go through this, but I am so glad that Harry was by our side. Top notch customer service with highly skilled, clean, courteous, can-do technicians. Highly recommend!

name: Carolyn Nelson
text: I’ve dealt with Total Comfort many times from maintenance to repairs and I’ve always been satisfied by their service. Eddy has been out to help us before and always seems to go that extra length to take care of our needs. We really appreciate everyone.

name: FLYBY
text: Had tech arrive, a young and inexperienced boy, explained the issues with the units, the tech did visual inspection only, never hooked up gauges, stated system is working fine. I realized the system was not working, I called 4 times, no one returned my calls, was not allowed to speak to the Manager, Jody, and was told it would be additional charge to come back. Be careful.

name: Cheryl Whitley
text: Sonny, the worker that came to help me on my AC today was a very polite, kind, and thoughtful person who took his time to explain everything that he did and why. There aren’t a lot of people who do that and I appreciate that! Thanks Sonny! Thanks Total Comfort for having a worker like Sonny!

name: Sonya Smith
text: Great experience from start to finish. I talked to Chelsea in the office and she sent Eddie out to service my Furnace the same day. Very friendly and knowledgeable company.

name: Robert Blackwell
text: Love the new owners and their Service Technicians! Eddie took care of everything we needed and got our AC running the same night. Vast improvements in service since the new owners took over.

name: Jason Lassiter
text:
Amending my original review: after an initial failure to properly schedule my appointment (see original review below) Total Comfort called the next business day to apologize and to make things right. They offered to send a technician right away and offered to waive the service call fee to make up for the inconvenience. I really appreciated this. Anyone who accepts responsibility for a mistake and makes a good faith effort to fix things gets a second chance with me. The technician, who was nice and professional, quickly found and fixed the issue (a simple clog). Before he left we got a call from the owner who explained that there would be no charge for the service. All in all Total Comfort really turned things around and they will get my future business.

Original Review: I made an appointment. They did not call and did not show. Can't recommend.

name: Rick Whited II
text: Everyone I got to work with was extremely polite, knowledgeable and very professional.

resp.text:
Thanks for the kind words.  We look forward to working with you in the future.

Thanks,

Keith

name: Alantha Russ
text: Nothing but good things to say about this company. Eddie came out today for the normal maintenance and did a great job as usual. We really appreciate the time Total Comfort puts in to making sure a job is done right.

name: Sam Henderson
text: Total Comfort came to our rescue!  This winter Charter/ Spectrum caused an electricity surge at my house starting and electrical fire, frying my HVAC system and frying the motor on a refrigerator and freezer. Total Comfort saved us before it got to cold by coming out and quoting us a fair cost and then doing the repairs quickly and with quality work. I know I will continue to use them!  Great people. Great Service. As for Charter, not so much.

name: Kaz McFly
text: I thought I needed to replace my AC but Harry with Total Comfort came out and spotted the problem and fixed it. He could have gotten me to buy a new unit but didn't. Instead he allowed me to take my time and not make a rush decision by fixing the problem. I highly recommend Total Comfort. Honest, nice and fast service

name: Frankie Roe
text: We had a great experience with Total Comfort Heating and Air. Our heat had stopped working suddenly.  When I called the office to make the appt., the lady I spoke with was helpful and courteous. Gary came out, was very nice, and within a few minutes, our heat was up and running again.  Would highly recommend these folks!!

name: Dennis Bryant
text: I bought a unit from this Company 10 years ago and it was an awful experience. To much to list. The unit went down this winter and i called to check on warranty information on the unit. Now this unit was purchased for my parents house and both are disabled. With that said my guard was up. As i placed the call i found that Total Comfort is under new management. Expecting the worst. Boy was i wrong. The new management and ownership at Total Comfort was a huge breathe of fresh air. The team at Total Comfort was honest and up front with me from the start. They offered about as much help to me as they could. The Technician named Soni that worked on my parents unit went above and beyond to take care of my parents. If you had a bad experience in the past then believe me its a new day with this Company. I personally want to say thank you to the team at Total Comfort for bending over backwards to give me any and every option they could. From an angry customer years ago to a customer that will only call the new team at Total for anything me or my family members need. Thank you Total for all your help.

name: Belinda Allen
text: Great company. Eddie came and installed a part I needed yesterday. Very polite and friendly.

name: J Davis
text: Can’t say enough good things about this company! Gary came out on a Saturday after 6 to fix our air out at Logan Martin. When I say that we were suffering, we were absolutely miserable in this house! It took him less than 10 minutes to fix the issue and cooled down a house full of women who came home after a Pell City mud run to an 87 degree house. Highly recommend Gary and Total Comfort heat and air!

name: Keely O'Really
text: Very honest and quick to diagnose our problems. We had 2 other companies come out and tell us 2 different things are wrong with our A/C unit only to find out by the Total Comfort tech that that was not the problem and even got our AC running for the time being until we could get it fix. Great service, came on time, and very polite and knowledgable. I recommend them to anyone who is in need of AC repair.

name: Margret Battle
text: Eddie came out last week to clean our package unit and thankfully caught some small issues before they caused major problems. He gave us a good price for repairs and helped us get financed quickly. Thanks TC

name: Diane Cook
text:
Absolutely wonderful experience. I had a total HVAC replacement plus blown in insulation. All technicians were on time, clean, courteous and completely professional. I will give them an A+ for a great job done.
Diane Cook

name: Kendall Jackson
text: Great experience.  Excellent new management and fair pricing!  Prompt service response.  Would recommend

name: Jason Smith
text: Just had our whole system replaced, and the guys at Total Comfort did a great job. Gary kept in touch with his whereabouts and time frame for the initial service call, and got the broken down system patched up long enough to get the new system in the following morning . The guys showed up with all the equipment before 8am and went straight to work after a friendly meet and greet with our dogs, who love company . They were both friendly and efficient, cleaned up after themselves, finished well before the estimated time frame, and did it all for a price that was on the low side of what we expected to pay . I would recommend these guys for any heating and cooling needs.

name: Carrie Cotney
text: Great experience! The service technician was polite and worked efficiently to solve our issue.  The new owners have done a great job!  I highly recommend Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Paige Cooper
text: I would recommend DJ for any services needed. He is friendly, courteous, and he cares about his customers.

name: Dustin Wilkerson
text: Excellent company to do business with. I highly recommend giving these guys a chance if you are in need of any HVAC work. It is my understanding they are under new ownership and are eager to ensure all of their customers are happy. They have definitely earned future business and recommendations from me.

name: Cal Markert
text: Saved me money with honest access net and only charged 50 for service call.  They knew what they were doing too.  Very pleased

name: Byron Williams
text: Thanks to Total Comfort for getting use up and running again. We appreciate the quick service and professional staff that came out to service our HVAC. After the tech explained everything I could readily see the problem and felt very comfortable going ahead with the repair. They where very professional.  We are very impressed.

name: Nathan Whitaker
text: We are attempting to sell our house and had an issue arise during inspection. Eddie had serviced the unit 2 weeks earlier and everything was in working order. We explained the issue about how we were held up with being able to close because of the inspection. Total Comfort went above and beyond and immediately came to ensure things were ok. Turns out that the inspector was wrong. The unit was working correctly. I video taped it to show the buyers the problem was not Total Comfort. It was their inspector. We have used Totsl Comfort for years and plan to have them install and new unit at our new home later. Eddie is the man!

name: debby cochran
text: Brett Shelton,  my service professional, was very nice and knowledgeable.I find they seem to care a lot about the customers.I would totally recommend them.

name: Holly Chapman
text: Thankful for the New Management for quickly repairing my unit. Professional, on time, and trust worthy. I would choose Total Comfort again and again and you should too!

name: Joe Randall
text: Cody was honest and efficient and took care of my problem. Will definitely call again.

name: Terry Payton
text: Glad they have new owners.  The new ones are terrific!   Took great care of us fast and very fair price.  Thanks again!

name: Stan Paschenko
text: Total Comfort has serviced my Hvac units for the past 3 years. I recommend this company because of their honesty and integrity. No pushy sales pitch.

name: Kelsey
text: I had an emergency call after coming home to an 86 degree house. There's technician was extremely friendly but no resolution was provided. Ther problem he said I had wasn't the problem at all. I missed an entire day of work to be told mid morning the next day noon one could come until afternoon. I could've gone to work in AC for the morning! Very disappointed in the level of service provided.

name: Valerie Chavez
text: Just  had total comfort heating and air come to my home and they just installed this new thermostat I could not be more pleased with their work friendly service and the price was just right.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Christy Thomas
text: New owners and management are fantastic!  Good quality customer service!  Very pleased with the work and it was completed in a timely manner.  Would definitely recommend!

name: Mike Gillespie
text: Very nice on the phone. Called to let us know the technician was on the way. Technician could not have been more helpful or professional with his explanations and wanting things to be done correctly! Would recommend them to anyone!!

name: Tracie Lewis
text: The tech was very courteous and professional. He and the company went above and beyond. Would highly recommend Total Comfort!

name: Jimmy Owen
text:
Setting the appointment was easy and the agent worked very well to set the appointment which was convenient for me.
The technician was great and explained everything very well.

name: JP Jones
text: David was very good at  doing his job and knowledgeable. Great personality

name: Blakely Segroves
text: We were so impressed with the new owners!  Prompt and reliable service to repair my unit.  Would highly recommend them!

name: Kandy Kane
text:
Eddie was fantastic!!! Very professional and quick at fixing our problem.
We will only be using this company from now on! If you have any problems with your heating or air, definitely give Total Comfort a call!

name: Julian Kit
text: Called them out after our unit stopped working. The guy who came out only saw $$$, down played our system every chance he could. Said its to small for the house (our house is fairly small and it's always keep us plenty warm). Told us our system had rust which was causing the problem but got it working by taking a piece of wire and cleaning out the sensor. Took less than 2 min to get the system working but cost almost 100$ for next to no work. 18 point inspection is also a lie.

name: Linda Fomby
text: Tyler arrived in a timely manner and solved my problem. Very efficient.

name: Betty Gunter
text: Eddie was at our home yesterday and he’s such a sweetheart. We felt a little silly when he told us why our furnace wasn’t working but we’ll know what to look for next time. Thanks!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Joanne Walker
text: Great Service starting with the operator who took my request for a service call, to the technician who came. Thank you Sonny for being on time, courteous, polite and your very thorough checkup of our heat and air system.

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: Rod Bunn Florida
text: Dj was courteous and knowledgeable and did a great job, I would recommend him to everyone I know

name: Curtis Nargo
text:
Total comfort heating and air LLC today August 18, 2016 as I am traveling down for 59 in Hoover I started hearing cracking sounds on my windshield as I got closer to the source while other cars were swerving to get away from this truck that was carrying loose rocks in the back of a small flatbed trailer uncovered and rocks falling all over the highway.  I saw two cars get struck with windshield broken my car was struck twice
with star break cracks in windshield, and as ice sped up to get around this total comfort heating and air truck IT LOOK LIKE HE WAS JUST LAUGHING AT ME!  I dialed there number tried to call but they kept hanging up on me stay away from this company if they don't have enough sense to haul gravel in the proper way.Bad reviews on these guys. !!

name: James Howlett
text: Eddie came out and took care of our Furnace quickly and gave us a great price for the repair. Will be using this company in the future.

name: Vista Brooks
text: Awesome Company!!! New management that still believes in making sure that mistakes that were made before are fixed. Quick service and a great staff!!!

name: Lillian Wilson
text: They have always been on time and very polite people.I am so glad we used them for our heating and air :)

name: lori krauss
text: Can not say enough about this company and Gary Dailey.  We noticed our air was not working around 3 pm on a Saturday. We were at our lake house in Talladega. I called four other companies, that said they were 24/7. None would return a call. No one even answered. I called Total Comfort and spoke to Gary. We were almost near heat stroke at this point. He could sense the desperation in my voice. He said let me make a few calls, and if I'm able I'll be on my way. Ten minutes later he called back and said he was on his way. Drove from Gardendale to Talladega to look at our unit and see what could be done. He was a lifesaver. It was the capacitor. He had a new one on his truck, and fixed it within 30 minutes. What normally would have cost a lot, on a Saturday evening was a few hundred bucks or so. I would have given them 10 stars if I could have. WE WILL NEVER USE ANYONE BUT TOTAL COMFORT AGAIN!!! IM not a person that leaves reviews, but I have never seen such amazing customer service EVER.

name: Zach Batizy
text:
Was quick and efficient. Helped solve the problem really well

-Sheila Batizy

name: Jay Cardwell
text: Harry did an outstanding job and he was very professional

name: Mora Taylor
text: Sonny was very professional and explained the process very well. I would highly recommend Sonny and Total Comfort Heating and Air.

name: Terrance Darling
text:
Great job!! Knowledgeable technicians!!! Thanks Harry and Sam.

Mr. Darling

name: B K Gray
text: Worst experience I ever had. Do not, and I repeat do not use this company. Misleading techs, customer service is terrible. Been trying to get a refund, will not return phone calls. I have a service level agreement, and had to buy a new unit from them(which now I don't believe I needed), and they treat you like crap. Everything is about $$$ to them. I agree with Julian

name: Madison Garner
text: They are very unloyal and misleading to their employees! The owner has very bad anger issues and treats people with the upmost disrespect! I wouldn't dare recommend their services not only because of how he does his employees, but by his general characteristic traits. Also the fact that he only hires " attractive young women" ( for office work), is also very disturbing and discriminating. He also doesn't seem to concerned with his customers either. Unless your buying a new unit or signing a service agreement you mean nothing to him.

name: Bryan Blackmon
text: Right Now, Christmas Eve 2014 marks less than 6 months with my new system (old one was 20+ years old and died) from this company. The installation re-used some of the parts from the old system. I have had to call them back out now for the third time in less than 6 months to check on the system and while the people are very friendly, I am highly unsatisfied. A unit of this age (when properly installed) should have zero issues cooling a townhome of my size and should (in general) have no problems. It is now Christmas Eve 2014 and all creatures are stirring because the damned-new HVAC Heat Pump will not cool off my home. Thanks.

name: Lonnie Moore
text: Technician showed up on time, assessed the problem and quickly fixed it. You can’t ask for more than that.

name: Barbie Moore
text: Extremely friendly and fast service 🙂🙂🙂

name: Calvin D Tucker II
text: Service above excellent!

name: Jessica Ray
text: Very professional, excellent customer service.

name: Soleado C
text: Awesome!!!!

name: Joseph Jackson
text: Honest, Experienced, Trustworthy, Timely, and Fair.

name: Joycelyn Oden
text: I had a very good experience with this company! I will be using them again!

name: Carolyn Robards
text: My older Trane A/C motor went out on an extremely hot day. I called that day at noon and they had a technician out before closing. My part was something they didn’t have on hand but they went above and beyond to get it for me as soon as possible. They installed it immediately and everyone I came in contact with was very professional, friendly and explained everything to me. I highly recommend this company!

name: David Pilkington
text: Skelton Heating,Cooling is one of the highest quality Companies you can use for your heating and cooling needs.there Tech's are prompt and courteous.Quickly identifies problems and efficiently solved them.A company with solid footing.You can't beat the value.I would definitely recommend.

name: Melissa Atemon
text: We had gotten an estimate from another company previously and not only were they pricier, but we also had to pay for the estimate. Brian came out and gave us an estimate and explained everything very clearly. The day of install they were early and got to work right away. They did an excellent job and were very professional. I will definitely be using them for our future HVAC needs.

name: Andy
text:
Purchased a brand new Trane A/C system.  They beat the next lowest proposal by $350. On top of the best price,  installation was well done.  Experienced technicians were punctual and did a great job; hauled old equipment away; new, larger pad; everything picked up and cleaned up.  Oh yeah, and the salesman was knowledgeable, courteous and respectful.
Good company.

name: larry lang
text: Top quality service from the ladies in the office , maintenance crew and the installers of my new unit. Job well done in a timely manner.

name: Debbie McCrobie
text: I have been using Skeltons since the owner started his business, working out of 1 van. Brian and his company have serviced my home for years. We also use them where I work and we have no complaints. They are all very nice, and know what they are doing. Starting with Amanda, in the office to all of the service techs,  its one heck of a company. We appreciate all you do for us.

name: Sammie Fowler
text: I recommend Skelton's to everyone.  They have maintained our air conditioners for 5 years now.  They have come out on the weekends when we needed service and we will be calling them to replace our older unit when it comes time.  Great People! Fantastic Service!

name: Matt Blair
text: We've been using Skelton's for years. They are a good family owned business that provides exceptional service. I use them for any HVAC needs at my home and my business. They just recently fixed an attic furnace at my home. Jonathon was professional and courteous. He arrived on time; then he diagnosed and fixed the problem in less than an hour.

name: Amber Flores
text: We went with them about a year ago and they did a decent job but not this time. We had absolutely no air in 90 degree weather. We called Friday and they told us they were busy and may not get to us that day which was fine (we wanted to go with them since we did last year so we didn't call anyone else) and they took our name and number and said they'd give us a call back that day and let us know when they could come. Late Friday no call, no text. I called and left a voice mail letting them know. Monday still no call so I called them again. We left another voice-mail. At this time we decided to call another company who scheduled us in as an emergency since it was so hot outside. It is now Wednesday and we have yet to get a call back from this company and our air is running beautifully thanks to the other awesome company we went with. My problem isn't the fact that they may have been too busy and couldn't see us this week,, my problem is the fact they couldn't call and let us know at any time in the past 6 days when the weather has been over 90 degrees in the house.

name: Robert Jones
text: Great service professional installation and great prices highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars.

name: omar nacky
text: We had to replace our 18 y/o central a/c.  Called Fondren from a recommendation.  They were on time, reviewed our situation, made a recommendation with pricing and delivered exactly as promised.  Will definitely use them again.  We had tried another company for repairs and found out they were changing parts unnecessarily and overcharging.  We trust Fondren because they were honest and fair.

name: Tuna Fish
text: L. Stablo invited me to wok here. Were me pesos. Plz elbo pablo

name: Joel Scott
text: I was promised a good job, and I got it 5 Stars!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Upon reviewing our files we are unable to find you in our client base. Please call our office if you have any questions or concerns. We strive for 100% customer satisfaction.

name: Amanda Townsend
text: Stanley and Dedra Fondren have been continuously in business for over 25 years.  You won't find any people with more honesty and integrity.

name: Lisa Hester
text: Best place!!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review

name: Tommy Duke
text:
They have a Great Friendly and knowledgeable Staff, the supplies that you need, and PRICING that you can afford!!!

text: I gotta say these guys are awesome. They’ve now installed two new AC units in two different houses for us. Each time, they were genuinely empathetic to fact that nobody’s having a good day when their AC breaks, and were more than fair in pricing. Yesterday, they came out to do annual service on that last AC unit, and their tech spent almost a whole extra hour with me - for FREE - to walk me through a water heater installation I was trying to do myself and was kinda in over my head on. The whole reason I opted to do that job myself was that one plumber quoted me $2k, and OnTime Service wanted $179 just to come out and offer a quote (no thanks). Needless to say, I trust Ethridge and would def recommend them.

name: David Sherrill
text:
I can't say enough good things about Ethridge. We have had to replace both of our units in our house over the last two years. During our most recent one, we had a small issue and they quickly sent someone out to fix it. When we had a problem with the older of the two units, they, again, quickly got someone on site to both fix the issue, and do a thorough investigation of both our units.

You know the quality of any company starts at the top and the is true here as well. Mr. Ethridge is such a great guy. He employs people like Daniel who is one of the nicest and most conscientious service people I've ever met.

So, if you need a new unit, service on your current unit, or just looking for someone to perform maintenance, I HIGHLY recommend Ethridge! They may not always be the absolute cheapest, but you do get what you pay for in this type of work. They are worth every penny!

The technician Daniel came out today and did an amazing job, he checked every area of the unit and provided excellent feedback.  It was really nice to experience this level of customer service,  I will not hesitate to call Ethridge in the future.

name: Brandon Mitchell
text: In a span of about 3 weeks fighting the AC and the home warranty company, my wife and I were really getting disheartened about just moving into our first home. We dealt with two separate AC companies with no avail before contacting Ethridge Heating and Air. Once I did, they made the process incredibly simple and stress free. They seemed to really care and were punctual with the install. Now, thanks to them, we are able to enjoy our new home and worry about the fun stuff about making a house a home. In my opinion there's only one HVAC company worth dealing with, and they now have a customer for life, Ethridge Heating and Air. They'll fix it FAST!

name: James Carter
text: Very professional and knowledgeable technicians. Installation of our new upstairs system went smoothly and was finished relatively quickly. I probably could have gotten cheaper service elsewhere, but I'd be hard pressed to say that I could have gotten better.

name: Richard Wederman
text: I called at 7:30 a.m. to have my to have my AC checked out, it started blowing warm the night before. Two technicians were at my house by 11:00 a.m. and had my unit diagnosed and fixed in 40 minutes. They replaced a faulty capacitor for a very fair price. Everyone was very professional and friendly. I highly recommend Ethridge.

name: sqlb3rn segfavlt
text:
Nice folks, absurd prices, had to call them back out on 2 separate occasions because the tech didn't finish the job. Got charged more money of course. Check around before you commit to thousands of dollars, I'll be using a different company from now on.

Edit: was quoted $710 to install a new fan blade and $1300 for a new fan motor. I bought a OEM fan blade online for $38 and installed it myself in 10 minutes. The motor is perfectly fine. Enjoying cold AC again after a 3 day wait for shipping. I don't know how they get off charging that much, I think they just want people to finance repairs.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback. We would love to resolve any issue but we can’t tell who you are based on the anonymity of your Google username. We take pride in our work, our pricing, and the handling of any customer concern. Nearly every customer that does a large job with us, shops around, does their homework, and in the end, hires us to do the work. The process goes smoothly, and everyone is happy. We apologize for whatever has caused you to feel differently and would like to resolve any concern fairly. So if you wouldn’t mind, please make yourself known to us as we had no idea there was an issue until now. You can do that here, or feel free to call our office to begin resolving whatever it is that concerns you. We’d love to help, but we don’t know who you are. If this is a true concern and this is not a case of you reviewing the wrong company, all you need to do is call to resolve. We are more than fair and will work with you to resolve your concern. Thanks!

Super quick response and 2 crew installation of our new units (2 outside units, furnace and condenser in basement, plus one condenser in attic). Unfortunately, they used RedBrick Financial Group for financing when we purchased our units, and RedBrick was awful to deal with! Shady practices, extremely rude “customer service”, no transparency in billing, difficult to make payments, and will put a lien on your home without notice or authorization. Stay away from RedBrick!
****Very glad to see (on Ethridge H & A website) that they NOW use Wells Fargo for financing! We have used WF for multiple banking accounts & they are very transparent and payments are easy to make in multiple ways.*****

name: dcasey
text:
I called and spoke with Becky (could have been Rebecca) in the office. She was very patient with me as I explained what was going on with my unit. I later learned that she obviously had taken really good notes based on the phone conversation I had a day later with the technician (wish I'd gotten his name).
The unit in question is at my house that is for sale. The buyer's "inspector" (loosely used here) said the unit had a serious problem. I had the unit maintained twice per year (it is important to note that this twice yearly maintenance was not done by Ethridge) for each of the 10 years since the unit was installed so I didn't really believe that much could be wrong with it but was required to have it checked out.
After thoroughly inspecting and testing the unit, the Ethridige technician called to let me know the unit was fine, in fact he found no problems at all.
He could have easily gone with what the "inspector" said and the repairs or replacement could have made them a lot of money. But, this company chooses ethics and honesty and in doing so earned a customer.
I recommend this company and I plan to contact them for a maintenance contract for my home because I know these folks will not take advantage of me.
