text: I wouldn't call any other company for my Heating/Cooling issues. They are always prompt, extremely kind and helpful and, more importantly, honest. They go out of their way to make sure to determine the problem and get it fixed in the quickest, most thorough way.  They are always glad to explain everything to you and answer any questions you might have.  Everyone that works for this company is an asset to company and the community!!  I especially give kudos to Will (today) Tyler, Cindy and Megan.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We do our best to make sure our clients know exactly what is going on with their unit.

name: Dane Benton
text:
Terrible workmanship paired with an equally repulsive attitude towards customers.

Our A/C unit died in August of 2017. Luckily, we had a warranty through Old Republic, which paid for a replacement unit. Unfortunately, however, the company that Old Republic required us to use for installation was 5 Star Heating and Air Conditioning out of Foley, AL.

Over the past year, we have experienced several issues with our new unit not cooling the house properly. About two months ago, we came home to soggy carpet and buckled wood floors due to the drain pipe for our unit overflowing. My father came by to take a look at the unit and noticed that the "Safe-T-Switch float valve", which cuts the unit off if the drain pipe clogs and fills up, was installed ON THE WRONG SIDE OF THE UNIT, rendering it completely useless.

We called 5 Star and they did come out to the house and move the valve to the correct side without charging us, which we felt was the least they could do since their poor workmanship was the cause of this incident. Over the past few weeks, we noticed that our outside unit would randomly cut off during the day, making the house unbearable to be inside. We called 5 Star, and they let us know that it would be $100 to come out and take a look at it. At this point, I decided to call another company to come look at it rather than paying 5 Star.

The other Service Man came out and took a look at it and noticed that the inside of the pipe that the float valve was attached to was clogged with sealant, preventing the flow of water. (See attached photos) I'm no plumber, but I can tell you that when you put sealant inside the female coupling, and push the male part in, the sealant has nowhere to go but inside the pipe, which prevents the drain pipe from being able to drain water. He replaced the drain pipe, and put the float valve in the correct place, and amazingly, our A/C unit works like new!

I will be sure to let everyone know how much money my "no-cost warranty replacement" A/C unit has cost me thanks to 5 Star's sub-par work.

Photo 1 - Crazy Straw like drain pipe from 5 Star
Photo 2 - Sealant inside pipe (photo taken after I punched a large portion of the sealant out of the pipe)
Photo 3 - New drain pipe installed by another {competent} A/C Repair company

resp.text: Dane, we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our options for maintenance. We felt that our repair of the float valve and drain line were sufficient in correcting the problem. We at 5 Star Air Conditioning pride ourselves on excellent workmanship, and truly hope that you understand our position with the 30 day warranty. Please remember proper maintenance is critical, and we are happy to hear that your A/C unit is working properly.

name: Christina W
text: Amazing service! Was able to text my issue and receive information about service call all via text. Paul M. responded quickly in less than 60 minutes from initial text to arrival. It took him approximately 5 minutes to ascertain nothing was wrong with the system...it was operator error! Paul asked insightful questions about what had happened that day and also explained how the system worked in summer and winter, so I learned a lot about systems down here and how to care for them as opposed to how systems run up North. When we need a new AC, we will definitely call 5 Star Air to do the job!

resp.text: Thank you Christina!

name: William Metais
text: Amazing company! AC unit quit and they showed up at my residence in less than 45 minutes. Diagnosed the problem and replacement of the entire system was the only option, as the original had served it’s useful life. Was one night without AC and they told me they would be there early next morning to install everything. Unbelievable! In meantime, they loaned me two portable units to keep the house somewhat comfortable. I’ve never heard of that!!!! What a great company! It was also a holiday weekend and they still we’re at my place at 7:00 A.M. the next morning and had the job completed by noon! Price fair and service outstanding. What more could a person ask for? I HIGHLY, HIGHLY recommend!!!!! Have NEVER had that kind of customer service from any HVAC company!!!

text:
My home was getting warmer and warmer. I didn’t know why because the air conditioner was on. Finally, I went outside to check the unit and saw the fans were not turning because one of the blades had been torn in half and was wedged along the unit’s edge. This is all happening in the early evening, I’m going to my granddaughter’s graduation & my unit is 21 years old. Being very new to the area, I called the business closest to me. What a WONDERFUL group of people!
They listened to my problem, came to my home immediately to assess the situation and gave me very useful tips and information. Took the damaged part and replaced it. Then, made sure it was working properly. They took care of me like I was a member of their family. Thanks to them, I made it to the graduation & my home was cool when I returned.

text: My outside AC unit failed and needed to be replaced. I called on a Saturday morning and Will came out diagnose their problem and was able to install a new unit within 12 hours. I’m very happy with the quality of his work. He really went the extra mile to get me back up and running.

name: Michael Roy
text: Extremely confident in the work done. Our tech was extremely courteous and kind. I hovered over him so I knew what was going on. He did not mind at all. True service with a smile. I will only go to 5 Star with my A/C needs! I have no reason to go anywhere else.

resp.text: Michael, thank you for taking the time to write a review!

name: Tom Boggs
text: Outstanding!  The team from 5 Star were polite, responsive, and professional. Donnie knew his business and quickly had my AC back running... very important in 100 degree heat!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Tom!

name: Eleanor Johnson
text: I am so very pleased with your service. Your promptness response when I call is very impressive. All of your service members are very helpful plus extremely nice. I am a very satisfied customer. Thank you for your service.

name: Penny Marlow
text: Was out of town all weekend. Returned to our home not feeling cool. Called 5STAR Monday morning and they were on property at 8:45. Service was completed under an hour. Will definitely use again if necessary and would recommend.

name: Richard Capps
text: Tyler at 5 Star installed a new ac/heat pump system inside and outside units with quick service outstanding price and set up a very substantial  rebate that I wasn't even aware of. If you want the best, honest company that actually cares about your ac and heating needs and doing the job right , backing up there work, then trust me , you need to call these guys.

name: Jessica Martel
text: Donny was fast effective and professional. Kids and I were thrilled to have out AC fixed so quickly!

resp.text: Thank you Jessica for the kind words! We are so glad Donnie could get you up and running again.

name: Havi javi
text: Great response time and professional service. Had a knowledgeable technician (Paul was very respectful and explained things easily) at the property within a few hours of contacting their call center, and it took less than an hour for him to diagnose and repair the problem. Will definitely use this company for future issues.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review!

name: brian oreilly
text: Absolutely would recommend this company. We didn’t have to wait long and they were in and out quickly. Will not hesitate to call again.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Brian!

name: De Dickey
text:
Really pleased with the professional service I received from five Star air conditioning.
Tyler, the owner, really knows how to assist customers with prompt and efficient service.
Very knowledgeable and has professional technicians , Scott and Kyle, to perform the
5Star air conditioning services.
Thank you for all your help as I am very pleased with my purchase.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words De!

name: Kelly Helton
text: They were fast friendly and very friendly and such a great price.   From the first call to the end result was AMAZING.    I will definitely be spreading the word You guys are AMAZING.  Will thank you sir you ROCK

resp.text: Kelly, thank you for taking the time to write a review!

name: Jenn
text: 5Star came out for service on my unit, for yearly maintenance check ups. We’re right on time, quick, and very kind. Will definitely use again!

resp.text: Thanks for leaving a review Jenn!

name: Bob Kayser
text: 5 Star has been my HVAC company for the past three years. They have installed two units and maintained 2 previously installed units for the entire time, and I couldn't be happier. Their prices are competitive, their work is meticulous, and they deliver just as you would want them to. Cindy and Ty are the folks you want to call when you need HVAC!

resp.text: Thank you Bob for the kind words!

name: Debra Webb
text:
After a night with no cool air, 5 star was quick to send Will out to fix the problem. He was knowledgeable and fixed our problem immediately.
So grateful for the professionalism from the time Cindy answered the phone till our problem was fixed
Thank you for  coming to our rescue!!!

name: Wayne Cheatwood
text:
We have called on the services of 5 Star Air Conditioning twice in the last 10 months on an older unit.
The first call was made and the cause was found to be a small snake had crawled in the unit outside and shorted out the unit.
The second time it was low on freon.
Both times we talked with a knowledgeable person on the phone to have a technician arrive in an timely manner. Both times the technician diagnosed our problem and took the time to explain the situation and what was needed. Both times the work was completed with no further problem.
I hope there isn't a 3rd time on this a/c unit but if there is we will call 5 Star for service or replacement if necessary.

resp.text: Wayne, thank you for taking the time to write a review!

name: Alison White
text: 5 Star Air Conditioning was recommended to me nearly four years and I have found them to be a great company with excellent service.  When my Air Conditioning unit broke down last summer, Tyler went to a great deal of trouble to find me a suitable replacement at a good price and it was installed within days.   I was thankful to know someone knowledgeable that I could trust.

resp.text: Thanks Alison!!

name: Cindy Mathis
text: Not enough good things to say about this company.  I called for an appointment at 10 in the morning and my problem was resolved by 1:30.  Don’t hesitate to call if you have an air/heat problem

resp.text: Thank you for the review Cindy!

name: joe thomassen
text:
I received outstanding service from 5 Star Air Conditioning yesterday, as I returned home from a long day's hike in extreme heat to find my air conditioning not working! I'm so glad I chose 5 Star for the service call! They were extremely nice and concerned for me...it was like reaching out to an old friend in the initial call! That meant a lot! Amazingly, the technician was at my door within an hour and promptly assessed my problem and thankfully, they had the uncommon part that was needed! Cindy, the totally charming wife of the 5 Star owner quickly brought the part to my house within minutes, and it was delightful to meet her!
The technician, Brandon was so nice as well, and although it was a complex fix, he did an excellent job and had my a/c going in no time!
I can't say enough about how pleased I am with my experience with 5 Star and I'm thrilled to know we have such a wonderful a/c service here in Foley! I'll definitely recommend 5 Star to all my friends! Thanks, 5 Star...you're awesome!

resp.text: Joe, thank you for the great review!

name: Don Kinkade
text: Very helpful. Worked closely thru the entire ordeal until it was complete.

name: GG E
text: I’m so thankful to Five Star!! They came out quickly on a HOLIDAY weekend. They were polite, professional and FAST !! Thanks you soooo much for awesome efficient service !!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: Debra Hipskind
text: I live in Indiana & have house trailer in Foley, Alabama! My heating & cooling system went out it was very old! My brother-in-law met 5 Star Air Conditioning there & they had it in, in one day, they trusted me to send them a personal check through the mail! Done a great job! Very pleased

resp.text: Debra, thank you for taking the time to write a review!

name: shane felkins
text: Great service very knowledgeable kind and courteous

resp.text: Thank you Shane for the 5 Star Review!

name: Gayle Dearman
text: I've been using 5-Star HVAC for approximately 6 years to service, repair or replace the 9 units I have ain my rental properties. I've been extremely pleased with 5-Star. The owners and employees are very knowledgeable, reliable, professional and courteous. I appreciate very much that they always manage to come quickly when I have a repair emergency. I also like knowing that I'm talking with a company owner when I call for service or questions. You definitely get your best response when company owners schedule their work.  I highly recommend the folks at 5-Star.

resp.text: Gayle, thank you for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate it!!

name: Lamar Beaird
text: I was completely satisfied with the service and the speed of getting my air back on the same day I called for service.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Lamar!

name: Mandy Shutt
text: So fast and friendly. I will definitely recommend to my personal friends and family.

resp.text: We are glad you are back cooling Mandy! Thank you for the kind words.

name: Brenda Deschermeier
text: Will is a very reliable in courteous person and really knows what he's doing when he does his job we enjoy having him come to our house and take care of our air conditioning and heating and would recommend them for anybody and five star air conditioning great business

resp.text: Thank you Brenda!!

name: Melissa Vest
text: Service was fast but was very expensive -  especially for the small issue we had with our A/C.

name: Kacie Minchew
text: I have been using 5 Star Air Conditioning since I have moved into my house. I would never use anyone else. They are a great company.

resp.text: Thanks Kacie!!

name: Mary Keen
text: Always courteous, clean and ready to take care of business. These folks are great to work with and much appreciated.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Mary!!

name: Sabrina Gavzy
text: These guys are amazing. I have never had a better experience. Not only are they dedicated but they kept me informed of everything they were doing. I would recommend them any day.

resp.text: Thank you Sabrina!

name: Robert Williams
text: The 5 star team has been servicing our A/C heating and our spa heater for 4 years. They are courteous , timely and thorough. They are well worth their work. We look forward to their visits every 6 months. Whenever we have had an emergency they respond immediately. Thanks to the 5 star team.

resp.text: Robert, thank you for the great review and recommendation. We appreciate you hearing that you were pleased with us the past few years. Thanks again!

name: Daniel Stevens
text:
Will and Brandon rocked our install. Professional and down to affordable business. I even needed help moving a dresser and Will assisted!! Highly recommend!!!

PS - Cindy helped in scheduling to get us back up and running as well.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Danny, glad we could help!

name: Robert Hilton
text:
We have had exceptional customer service with 5 Star every single time we’ve dealt with them. From their knowledge of key issues and their willingness to go above and beyond to help has been quite a surprise in a world full of lack luster, ineffectual technicians and companies.
I’ll use and recommend their services every time!
Thanks again for everything!!
Ben R.

resp.text: Ben, we appreciate you taking the time to leave this review.

name: sarah dean
text: We called 5 star Friday night at 6 p.m.  By 10 a.m. Saturday morning they had called and had our problem fixed!  Thank you so much for your prompt response and we will definitely use 5 star again in the future.

resp.text: Thanks Sarah!!

name: Tracy Snider
text: Replacing home A/C..Easy to work with from quote to install.  Good communication all thru the process.  Great work and product on time and best value I could find.  If you need HVAC work you cannot do better.

resp.text: Thanks Tracy, we too enjoyed the process too!

name: Bob Crachet
text: A bunch of these reviews are bogus. Jennifer Flowers is the owner’s tenant.

name: Nicholas Zinevich
text: Super service, from the 5 Star team. Tyler arrived Friday found our problem and a decision was made to replace the system. Scott and Brandon showed up on time today (Saturday) ahead of the following Monday appointment. Much appreciated as hot humid weather is upon us.This was a major swap out which was performed in a very professional friendly manner. Upon completion they left the place spotless. They are an asset to 5 Star.

resp.text: Thanks for the shout out for Scott and Brandon!

name: Patsy White
text: We own a condo in Gulf Shores. We have snowbirds in for the winter and the air conditioner stopped working! Who knew it would be 80 degrees on New Year's?? I called our home warranty company and they gave me several companies to choose from. After reading all of the reviews and talking to the nice folks there, I knew Five Star Air Conditioning would be the the right company to deal with. They sent a technician out and he got our unit fixed in no time at all! Our snowbirds are happy and so are we! If you need an air conditioning company you will not go wrong by using Five Star Air!

name: Irene Weaver
text: We called 5 Star Air Conditioning to come out to Pic N Pay. And Cindy was very polite on phone. Said she would have someone out that Day. And Scott comes to Store and Looks at A/C and Shows Us What all was wrong. He got started and within No Time we had Air. Scott Done an Awesome job. We are very pleased with Scott work. And We Highly Recommend 5 Star Air !!! Thank You Scott for your Help !!!

resp.text: Thanks Irene, we appreciate the five star review. We are delighted that we were able to get you up and cool! Let's us know if we can be of help in the future. Thank you.

name: Betty Blakeney
text:
A very reliable company of
owners and employees.  Very trustworthy, time efficient, treats customer with respect, helps to save money and will even come on Sunday if needed.  I cannot say enough kind words regarding 5 Star!
B. Blakeney

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Betty :)

name: Jennifer Byrom
text: Finally! I have found an HVAC company that is compassionate and will go out of their way to take care of their customer.  This is a company you can trust and I am extremely happy with their service.  They scheduled a time between 2:30 and 3 pm, they beat me to the house! It is hard to find reliability and honesty with repair companies, and I strongly believe I have found one with 5 Star Air Conditioning.  Thank you so much!

resp.text: Jennifer, thank you for the wonderful review. We are pleased that you were satisfied with your service and repair.

name: Wade Andrews
text: Fast response, great service, and quick turn around. Repairs and replacements are done well with clear communication and explanation of services and costs. Friendly and professional - will definitely continue to use for all HVAC needs.

name: Gavin N
text: These folks are amazing. Go above and beyond, whatever it takes to get the AC job done!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Gavin!

name: Shannon Taylor
text: They are top notch. They always take care of me   Couldn’t be happier.

resp.text: Thank you Shannon!

name: Luanne McCarley
text: Tyler, Cindy, and their crew will take care of you. Our air conditioner stopped cooling early on a Friday morning. I called 5 Star Air Conditioning and they were here that morning. It was bad news, the compressor. The really bad news was there wasn't one available in the area which meant we would be without air on the hottest weekend of the summer. The good news: 5 Star loaned us a portable unit to use through the weekend. They were here bright and early Monday morning with the new compressor and we had air conditioning again before lunch. We always recommend 5 Star to our friends and family.

resp.text: Thanks Luanne, we appreciate the wonderful review and your kind words. We are happy that we were able to help you with a temporary solution until we could get you a new one installed. We thank you for the recommendation!

name: Debra A Kline
text: We have been using 5 Star for several years to do the maintenance on our units. They are always thorough and prompt when doing the service, and are without fail quick to respond when problems arise.  Recently, one of the units needed to be replaced and Tyler’s team installed the new unit in a timely and professional manner.  We highly recommend this company!

resp.text: Debra, we appreciate the review and your continued support. It is always a pleasure doing business with you.

name: Brian Hart
text:
Absolutely great experience. Nobody likes having to replace the HVAC system but 5 Star made the experience as painless as possible. Cindy sent me a quote, which I compared against a few other local companies. I felt I would get the best value from 5 Star Air Conditioning so I chose them.

Scott, Brandon, and Wesley performed the installation. All three were courteous and professional. I could tell they take pride in their work through the attention they paid to how they wired and plumbed the units. They took the time to answer my questions during the installation, and then walked me through what they did after the work was complete.

My new American Standard unit is running great, much quieter than the old unit and I’m pleased with both the equipment they recommended as well as the quality of work they provided.

resp.text: Thank you Brian, we appreciate hearing compliments on our work and professionalism. Please let us know if we can be of service in the future.

name: Chuck Lebet
text:
Great service. These service techs know their skills. Thanks again for your fine customer service!
.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Lebet!

name: Sydney Ann
text: We called over the weekend when our unit went out. They were out that day to check the problem and diagnosed it on the spot. They were back the following morning to replace pie unit. There was no long wait. The transaction was smooth, service was great!

name: Richardson Services LLC
text: Very satisfied and happy with the work that Scott and Brandon did! Great, dependable, hard workers that were also very friendly. I highly recommend using 5 Star Air Conditioning and will do so if needed again in the future.

resp.text: Kyle, thank you for the five star rating. We appreciate the recommendation and please give us a call in you ever need us.

name: Tommy Lee
text: Tyler and 5 Star Air Conditioning are simply first class. They are knowledgeable, helpful and you can depend on what they tell you. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for service to your existing system or if you need a new system installed. You'll be glad you called them.

resp.text: Tommy, thank you for the wonderful review. We appreciate your comments and business.

name: Sharon Sofsky
text: This company is amazing! Today my AC went out and within an hour they had me up and running again! I would highly recommend this wonderful company !! 5 STARS FOR A 5 STAR COMPANY!

resp.text: Sharon, thank you for the five star rating. We are happy that we were able to get you serviced quickly! If we can be of help in the future, just give us a call. Thank you again.

name: Sherry Weaver
text: Wonderful company, owners, and crew! They came in and replaced our outdated system; were courteous and knowledgeable and even swept up before they left!! I got to meet Tyler and Cindy, and feel like I have 2 new friends in Foley :)   Thank you Scott and crew for your hard work!!

resp.text: Sherry, it was our pleasure to do business with you. Thank you for the great review from your two new friends in Foley!

name: John Gray
text: Very Friendly, and quick. I called them and they were able to repair my AC Unit the same day. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Thanks for the great recommendation, John! We truly appreciate your business and your kind words.

name: Larry Morgan
text: Our old unit went out on Friday.  5 Star set us up with a temporary unit for the week end. They arrived Monday morning with the new unit and had us up and running by early afternoon.  We appreciated 5 Star's quick response to our issue and their professionalism.  We look forward to our continued relationship!

resp.text: Thanks Larry, we are thrilled you and Judy are enjoying your new unit!

name: Megan B
text: 5 Star Air Conditioning went above and beyond from the beginning. When I first spoke with Ms. Cindy she was eager to help with my issue, she got a technician scheduled to come take a look on the the next day. Tyler was my technician assigned to come by my house and take a look at the problem, he was very efficient and explained the problem in a way I could understand! I will always choose 5 Star as my go to A/C company.

resp.text: Thank you Megan, we appreciate your review. We are happy that we could get you all fixed up and just give us a call anytime you need us.

name: Veslava F
text: They have always treated us like we were their only client and we love that about 5 Star AC

resp.text: Thanks for the review V

name: Ralph Winton
text:
These guys are the best!  Had a motor go out on my AC unit during the summer and thought it would take several days to get fixed. I called 5 Star and the service tech diagnosed the problem, ordered the parts, and the following day I was up and running!  Competitive pricing as well.

I recently had another issue and explained the problem to the receiptionist. She got a service tech to call me back (5 min) and he and I fixed the problem over the phone. Saved me the cost of a house call!

I would definitely call these guys for any and all AC/Heat repair. You won't be disappointed!

resp.text: That is great to hear Ralph! We love it when we are able to take care of our customers as soon as possible. Thank you for the 5 stars!

name: Jim Stewart
text: I have never been treated so well by any company, from start to finish. The phone was answered on the first ring and, when I explained my issue (a/c problem on a 100 degree day), Cindy said she would call me back when the next repair tech was available. She replied within 20 minutes and said the technician would be on site in less than an hour. He arrived in 30 minutes and immediately diagnosed the problem. It was a minor problem (for him) but a major one for me, and I was treated like I was the only customer he had all day. I would recommend 5 Star to anyone!

resp.text: Jim, thank you for the wonderful review. We are glad that we were able to fix your problem quickly and get you some relief in this heat. We appreciate the recommendation and glad to be of service!

name: Veslava F
text: They have always treated us like we were their only client and we love that about 5 Star AC

resp.text: Thanks for the review V

name: Kevin Gorman
text: I am very happy with 5 Star A/C

resp.text: Kevin, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Jonathan McKenzie
text: 5 Star is an amazing company that TRULY cares about their customers and are absolute experts in their field. I can’t think of anything negative and I have used them for over 4.5 years. Thanks!!

resp.text: Jonathan, thank you for the wonderful review and being such a loyal customer. We appreciate the five stars!

name: Lewkutz Family
text: Couldn't ask for a better company! Tyler, Cindy and 5 Star Air Conditioning have done a great job for me since day 1. I wouldn't call another company. They have my business as long as I'm in Gulf Shores!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Andrew Hudson
text: 5 Star Air Conditioning is absolutely AMAZING!! Cindy is the most helpful person, she brightens up the day every time I call with a problem. Then there is Tyler, what a WONDERFUL person, so punctual, informative and honest! They are not out to take advantage of the people in need of HVAC repair, they are truly there to help, such a delightful change from most companies today! I would highly recommend them for any of your HVAC needs!

resp.text: Andrew, it is our pleasure to serve you. Thanks for the review :)

name: Kristan Croom
text:
I have Never been treated so poorly by a company in all my years. I've been in sales and customer service myself for 21 years and can not fathom treating someone the way that the owners treated me.  T actually told me he'd never seen his wife/co-owner treat anyone as poorly as she had me. He also said if you are not on her good side, she will make sure the installation is prolonged "like she did a customer in Point Clear." Well, he was honest about that!  BUT...
I was lied to, I was reprimanded on the phone, I was discriminated against, and was led on for 3 weeks and 4 days without Air Conditioning. My home warranty is conducting a detailed investigation and I hope They will never be able to do this to anyone again. They were cruel and vindictive.
The absolute lack of professionalism, maturity, and kindness is just disturbing.

name: Daniel Barrow
text: Called to ask if they sell parts. Innocent question. Lady who answered the phone said no. When I asked if she knew who around here would, she said nobody should. And that was as helpful as she was willing to be.

resp.text:
Hi, Mr. Barrow,

We apologize for the communication that you felt was not very helpful to your situation. We try to be as helpful and informational as possible while still running a business. The supply stores that we purchase materials from do not sell to the public and, we are truly sorry, that we can not be of additional assistance on who you can purchase from.

name: Ralph Hellmich
text: 5 Star did an outstanding installation of a new unit for me this past summer.  The employees were courteous and really fast.  Unfortunately my unit was in the Attic and it was very hot and a small space.  The installed unit is better in quality workmanship and ductwork than when I built my house with a new unit.   Outstanding work, great price, good equipment thx again ...Ralph G Hellmich

name: Judy Thurmond
text: I can't say enough wonderful things about 5 Star A/C. I can promise you you will not be disappointed with the service you will receive from Tyler, Cindy, and the rest of the crew at 5 Star A/C.  We have 5 condo's...4 in Gulf Shores and 1 in Orange Beach and for the past 5 years Tyler has serviced all of our units and done complete HVAC replacement in a few of our units. All service and replacement have been done in a prompt , courteous, and professional manner. Even our guest who have been in our condo's when we have had a/c problems have commented on how quickly they arrived, evaluated, and fixed the problem. You just can't find service like they provide anywhere else.  I would never consider using any other air conditioning company but 5 Star A/C!

resp.text: Judy, thank you for the wonderful review. We appreciate you being a loyal customer and look forward to many more years working together.

name: Ralph Hellmich
text: 5 Star did an outstanding installation of a new unit for me this past summer.  The employees were courteous and really fast.  Unfortunately my unit was in the Attic and it was very hot and a small space.  The installed unit is better in quality workmanship and ductwork than when I built my house with a new unit.   Outstanding work, great price, good equipment thx again ...Ralph G Hellmich

name: Rachel Johnson
text: Tyler and Cindy are always there to help! They have great customer service and took time to help me figure out the issues over the phone late at night. Thank you for taking care of our personal and business AC needs!

resp.text: Rachel, thank you so much! You are the best!

name: Brad Nicks
text:
5 Star Air Conditioning installed my new AC system with an outstanding professional crew that went beyond my expectations.
Tyler quoted me with 4 options, showed me the difference in SEER ratings, filled out my registration and completed my rebate for $600  with Baldwin County EMC.
I would highly recommend 5 Star for any service or replacement on an AC system.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Brad!

name: Stephen Tunstall
text: They were very professional, responsive and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thanks Stephen!

name: fatboyz1998
text: Just got AC fixed by Tyler & his team!! quick and honest...... first class service, highly recomend them!!! CB in OB

resp.text: Thank you for the great review and we appreciate hearing that you were happy with your service.

name: willie godwin
text: They were very professional and gave us tips on the things we can do to maintain our unit.

resp.text: Thanks for the review Mr. Godwin

name: Timothy Lower
text:
The Higginbotham’s are Honest Hard working HVAC Tech with Integerty, I Love my Air Conditioning (Keep it at 68)  and The 5 Star comfort Club is a Must to keep us Comfortable on the Gulf Coast! Thank you for your Hard work Keeping me Cool!
#WherestheBOSS

resp.text: Timothy, we appreciate the great review! Let us know if we can help you at anytime. Thanks again!

name: Matt Trostel
text: My first two needs for an HVAC expert were emergencies and 5 Star came through for me each time.  Not only did the tech put in extra time to help me out, the bill didn't reflect the typically high costs of emergency work.  Sign them up as YOUR go-to HVAC experts.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We truly appreciate your business and kind words!

name: Josh Williams
text: Top notch service that I couldn’t be more happy with. Courteous and honest.

resp.text: Thank you Josh, we appreciate the review and comments.

name: Don Johnson

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and for the 5* Don!  We look forward to working with you again too.

name: Jonathan Hicks
text: Technicians are great but the customer service and total lack of respect from the lady in the office is unnecessary.

resp.text: Jonathan, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review and comments. We are glad that our technicians were able to take care of your AC problem. Thank you.

name: Michelle Miller
text: Amazing service! Would recommend them to everyone!

resp.text: Michelle, thank you for the amazing five stars. Let us know if we can help you again in anyway.

name: Jim Bills
text: Fast and friendly service. Thanks for the help this weekend.

resp.text: Jim, thank you for the five star rating and kind words. Let us know if we can be for future service.

name: Sue Alford
text: Got me up and running/cooling quickly!!!!

resp.text: We were happy to help Sue! Please give us a call anytime!

name: sheila hodges
text: Always available and so knowledgeable
